name: Hummingbird Mind
summary: Hummingbird Mind is a short visual novel / interactive story about distraction, daydreaming, and working from home.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Wonder Adventure
summary: Hunter X Hunter: Wonder Adventure is an entry in the Hunter X Hunter series for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Ubawareta Aura Stone
summary: The second Hunter X Hunter game released on the original PlayStation.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Maboroshi no Greed Island
summary:
Hunter X Hunter: Maboroshi no Greed Island is a PlayStation Role-Playing entry in the Hunter X Hunter series. It's an RPG with randomly generated dungeons.

As a novice hunter, explore the mysterious Greed Island along various other characters from the anime. The island's towns and cities have dungeons that seem to change when you go in them.

name: Hungry Shark Evolution
summary: A game for tablets and smartphones where you experience life as a shark, earning money and a high score by eating fish and unaware swimmers and creating combo chains.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Kindan no Hihou
summary: Hunter x Hunter: Kindan no Hihou is a Japanese adventure game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Ryumyaku no Saidan
summary: Hunter X Hunter is a Japanese adventure game for the PS2. Many characters from the Hunter X Hunter universe are playable in this sidecrolling beat-em-up.

name: Huygen's Disclosure
summary: An action adventure game that takes you to an alien world of mystery and hidden dangers.

name: Hungry Corgis
summary: Feed a handful of the most popular stars of corgi blogs in this Android game.

name: Hunters: Episode One
summary: Hunters: Episode One is a turn-based strategy game for iOS and Android. Players take control of a squad of bounty hunters and complete missions to earn credits and experience.

name: Hunter's Trophy 2: Europa
summary: A hunting game from Bigben Interactive.

name: Hugo Troll Race
summary: Hugo races on a handcart.

name: Hugo: Retro Mania
summary: Remake of Skærmtrolden Hugo.

name: Hugo Safari
summary: Hugo shows some films on an African safari and educates the player.

name: Hugo 2 1/2
summary: Enhanced re-release of the Game Boy game Hugo 2.

name: Hugo 2
summary: Sequel to the original Game Boy game, although it doesn't follow the Crazy Castle gameplay.

name: Hugo: På Nye Eventyr - Del 2
summary: More adventures of Europe's favorite troll.

name: Huge Insect
summary: Huge Insect is one of Sachen's rarest unlicensed games for the NES, originally developed by Thin Chen Enterprise in 1993 and listed in Sachen's catalog but never actually produced until a limited run of circa 30 copies in 2001.

name: Hunter X Hunter: Hunter no Keifu
summary: Hunter X Hunter: Hunter no Keifu is a Japanese strategy game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Hurdle Turtle
summary:
"Slow and steady wins the race?" That's for chumps! For this turtle, it's all about pure speed and sweet spin jumps! Compete in the ultimate hurdle challenge solo, or take it on with a buddy for some intense multiplayer action in this survival marathon of madness! 

Modeled after the games of yesteryear, this is the second entry in the Holmade Games 8-Bit Series.

name: Huxley Pig
summary: Huxley Pig for the Commodore 64, based off the TV series

name: Hunchy 2010
summary: An action platformer made by STOS Basic.

name: Hunchy 1066
summary: An action platformer made using STOS Basic.

name: Hubert the Teddy Bear: Holiday Island
summary: Hubert the Teddy Bear: Holiday Island from Teyon

name: Humanity Must Perish
summary: Humanity Must Perish is a short, comedic visual novel in which the fate of humanity is placed in the hands of a witty, pessimistic android.

name: Huebrix
summary: An abstract and original puzzle game from Noodlecake studios

name: Hunting Unlimited 4
summary: Hunting Unlimited 4 places the player in the shoes of a hunter in over 50 action packed missions.

name: Hunting Unlimited Trophy Collection
summary: The first three Hunting Unlimited games in one box.

name: Hunting Unlimited
summary: Hunting Unlimited is an animal hunting game with a focus on action and hunting skill. It is the first in SCS Software's hunting series.

name: Huanxiang Sanguozhi
summary:
An fantasy RPG set in the era of the Three Kingdoms in China that was developed by UserJoy Technology.

In China there is a legend about the mighty Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor, who lived about 3000 BC. He waged war against two other powerful monarchs, Yandi and Chiyou, fighting for control over China. After a long time, the power of Yandi was reduced, and Chiyou disappeared, allowing Huangdi to become the emperor. But the war was not over. For centuries and millennia later it continued, taking different shapes - blood, battles and ambitions of warlocks would not end. In the Three Kingdoms era, 3rd century AD, the ancient war was revived once again. And so the seventeen-year-old boy Ji Xuan, proficient in sword fighting, and his older sister Ji Shuang, a master of demon-summoning, found themselves involved in a great conflict that will soon change their lives forever...

"Huanxiang Sanguozhi", meaning Fantasy Story of Three Kingdoms, is based on historical events, featuring famous characters from the Three Kingdoms epoch, which became so popular in Asia thanks to Luo Guanzhong's classic novel. But the game gives a different interpretation to the story, involving fictional and supernatural characters and themes that were absent in other adaptations of the saga. The game plays like a traditional Asian RPG. You can set your combat style to be entirely turn-based, or with active time element, like in Final Fantasy games. The battles are viewed from isometric perspective, while navigation through the game world is done from a regular third person view. The enemies are visible in hostile areas, but appear randomly on the world map. The game allows you to choose between three difficulty levels.

name: Hunchback at the Olympics
summary: Summer Games clone.

name: Huggly Saves the Turtles: Thinking Adventures
Hula Wii: Minna de Fura Oodorou!
Humpty Dumpty meets the Fuzzy Wuzzies
Hunter Story
summary: 《Hunter Story》is a horizontal action game which Use 2D cartoon style. Players play legendary hunters in the game. As a hunter, you must collect equipment and hunting monsters to survive in the vast world.

name: Humpsters
summary: A bizarre experimental game surrounding the concept of "humping monsters," and competing these monstrosities against each other for limbs.

name: HuniePop 2: Double Date
summary: Take a trip to an exotic island paradise for a steamy new adventure in this long awaited sequel to the popular dating sim / puzzle game hybrid, HuniePop!

name: Huxley: The Dystopia
summary:
Huxley: The Dystopia was published by Webzen in Korea, and internatinally in 2010 after NHN USA stopped hosting its beta. It was developed by Webzen;s H-Studio.

Huxley was a MMO first-person shooter with a focus on cinematic action and multiplayer clan battles.
It was shutdown in 2010 after 7 months of open beta in Korea.
A Xbox 360 version was being planned in 2008 but was put on hiatus later on.

The game had 2 English closed beta tests though a partnership with NHN USA before separating with an announcement in 2010 that Webzen would take over the international publishing.

The game was shutdown/canceled on December 30th, 2010.

name: Hupchoo: The Gorps and the Sneezing Spell
summary: Players must find the cure to a 'sneezing spell' in this educational adventure game.

name: Hunting Unlimited 3
summary: The third in SCS Software's Hunting Unlimited series.

name: Hunter of antiques
summary: Just one wrong step and you die

name: Hunted Dream House
summary: Haunted Dream House is a 3-D text based horror mystery. You find yourself in a familiar yet obscure house and must find your way... but it won't be easy, nor are you alone in this haunted dream house.

name: Humans VR
summary: Humans VR is a game dedicated to the endless possibilities and experiences of virtual reality. This game will offer the player everything that this technology can provide.

name: Hudson Selection Vol. 1: Cubic Lode Runner
summary: Isometric puzzle/action game. Released exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo Gamecube and the Playstation 2.

name: Hugo in Space
summary: The troll Hugo goes, or rather flies, into his adventures in completely new ways. This time he finds himself in the infinite universe and the his family is involved. The evil witch Scylla's spies find out about the discovery of a new large asteroid in outer space, consisting entirely of the black diamonds. Scylla immediately breaks into Professor Rumbohr's house to steal his technology, improves it with her dark magic, and together with Don Croco and his soldiers hastily sets off into outer space. She wants to collect all the energy of the black diamonds to make a ray of pure evil that will enchant the Troll Forest's peaceful animals and turn them into her monster minions. It is up to Rumbohr, Hugo, Rat and Rut and the Professor to thwart Scylla's diabolical plan. Hugo needs to land on the different planets of Solar System in order to get the super fuel and a weapon for the job. With it the can reach Scylla, who is already on the asteroid, and battle her there to destroy her mining base, and then chase after the fleeing witch herself to defeat her before she can get away.

name: Hunters Life
summary: Hunters Life is a game where you have to go through different rooms. Each room has a finish point and to solve this you need to find clues and combine them to open up next room.The game is simple, it can be finished quickly depending on your mind skills.

name: Huge Beer Pong Challenges VR
summary: Huge Beer Pong Challenges VR is a single player compilation of challenges and secret desires; a playground of inspiration; and an escape to a place of ball bouncing, cup draining, heart sinking awesomeness.

name: Hunahpu Quest. Mechanoid
summary: "Hunahpu Quest. Mechanoid" is a challenging 2D platformer about the new adventures of an epic indian hero Hunahpu.

name: Hurry Up Bird Hunter!
summary: Hurry up! Time flies! Hunt as many birds as possible before the time runs out. With several different types of objectives, you're given a unique and challenging variety from start to finish.

name: Humanitarian Helicopter
summary: Two pilots, James and Ben, are on a quest to help survivors of earthquakes in California. Each of them learns to help instead of harm survivors. Having a helicopter the player rescues people by transporting them to survived houses, supplying additionally food for them. They overcome difficulties such as strong wind, wild animals willing to takeover over discharged food, closed gates to settlements. The aim of the game is to form only positive character traits. There are 50 levels, 3 modes of difficulties and 8 skills who can be employed to improve performance in the game. Game offers an option of off-TV play as well.

name: HullBreach: Uncloaked
summary: An updated version of Wii Browser MMORPG HullBreach Online.

name: Hunting Animals - Shooting Simulator
summary:
Winter hunting has never been so realistic! 
Professional equipment and smart prey
Dangerous enemies and free exploration 
Hunting in Ontario, Alaska or Colorado. 
Each location proposes challenging hunting missions.
it's Hunting Animals - Shooting Simulator!

You can also meet trophy animals on some of the levels. Find them to decorate your own trophy room.

Choose from the weapons available:
sniper rifles
hunting rifles
professional crossbow
shotgun.

Characteristics:
dangerous animals to hunt down
professional equipment
3 locations to hunt on with numerous missions
sniper aiming
hunting with a dog
free exploration.

name: Hustle Castle
summary:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!

Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

name: Hurricane.io
summary:
It's just a inconspicuous cloud, or is it? Even tiny clouds can become deadly under the right weather conditions. At the beginning of the match, your cloud is small, but gradually it will grow into a super hurricane. Face-off against global competitors in this top .io massively multiplayer online strategy game.

Beware of other clouds, they will want to swallow you . Gain energy from the elements: air (clouds and heat) and water (from the ocean). Absorbing, destroying and killing other hurricanes will make you grow faster.

The ideal living environment for hurricanes is on the ocean. On the land will lose energy. But if you are strong enough, nothing can stop you!

It’s a live multiplayer game, If you can’t connect to the internet, the game will enter offline survival mode.

name: Hunt Down the Freeman
summary:
It's time to tell the story of the villain. Hunt Down The Freeman takes you into a journey like no one has before. Witness the pain of the villain firsthand with over 14 hour gameplay, over 40 levels, immersive gameplay, cinematic cutscenes and an over an hour long, heart touching OST.

The player picks up the Machete of H.E.C.U Sergeant Mitchell, who finds himself in a hospital during alien invasion so called 7 Hour War. Mitchell is thrust into a battle of survival and is forced to face challenges to survive. This marine has to use all of his training, both with firearms and thinking tactically, to parkouring across the levels. Mitchell has to manage his inventory with over twenty-six unique weapons and gadgets, find the best way to get the job done, and do whatever it takes for his own survival.

name: Hunting USA
summary:
Hunting USA is a hunting simulator that takes part in realistic open world environments across America. Hunt and track a variety of small and big game animals such as pheasant, quail, deer, boar, mountain lion, bison, moose, and bear. Earn money for future hunts and equipment.

The unique environments reflect real locations in full detail. Walk, ride ATV's or horses, and boat across maps as large as 20 sq miles. Track and spot wild game, using dogs, calls, trail cameras, and blinds.

Equip yourself with an arsenal of different shotguns, rifles, bows and even revolvers! At the hunting lodge, purchase equipment and upgrades, or check out your trophies and kill stats.

Full controller support for a better and more precise experience.

More weapons, gear, animals, and environments being added in future updates!

name: Huey
summary:
Huey is a classic 2D platform game combined with original puzzle elements. It is a game full of surprises. Guide Huey through various levels, gather various pickups and avoid dangerous enemies as you try to reach the level exit. Run, roll, ride, swim and climb your way through exotic worlds, explore hidden areas and fight level bosses.

Features:
More than 50 levels
Filled with secrets and hidden areas
Challenging boss fights
Colourful pixel graphics
Original soundtrack

name: Hugo
summary: Hugo is a port of Mickey Mouse II, being most known in the West as The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle II. The characters were changed from the Disney or Looney Tunes franchises for the Hugo franchise. This version was only released in Europe.

name: Husky Express
summary: Husky Express is an MMORPG developed by DevCat Studio and serviced by Nexon. It is a casual style game whose main content is trade between camps and the training of sled dogs. Unlike other MMORPGs, it was characterized by no combat elements at all. Nexon terminated service for this game in 2011.

name: Humans 1 and 2
summary: The Humans and The Humans: Insult to Injury were combined and released for both Amiga CD32 and PC under the name Humans 1 and 2

name: Hunter Willie Hunting Wild Safari Dinosaurs
Hunter Killer
summary: Submarine simulator set in the North Sea during WWII.

name: Hurrican
summary: Hurrican is a freeware jump and shoot game created by Poke53280 that is based on the Turrican game series. Blast your way through nine action-packed levels filled with different enemies and powerups.

name: Hue Defense
summary: In defense of HUELand, a natural paradise with the most complex and corrupted government systems int he world, fight against corrupt politicians and their supporters – whether at borders, fields or cities. Customize your defensive strategy with several upgradeable towers and enhancements.

name: Hunt
summary: Hunt is a cross between a first person shooter game (FPS) and a wilderness hunting game.

name: Hush
summary: Hush is a short sociopolitical game inspired by the Rwandan Genocide in 1994, the darkest period of the Rwandan Civil War. Hush has the player relive the historical events through a personal experience - helping the Tutsi mother Liliane with her lullaby to keep her child silent and thus hide it from the Hutu.

name: Hungry Games: Survive in a world of predatory fish
summary: A colorful mixture of RPG, arcade and runner, about the survival of your fish that you will love)

name: Humble Pie
summary: You are the new Head Chef at the White House after the last one was fired. You keep getting midnight calls from the President requesting desserts, specifically, “The tastiest dessert ever!” Tonight, like a good American, you’re gonna give it to him...

name: Human-powered spacecraft
summary: A nostalgia-infused pixel clicker in a comedy wrapper.

name: Hummingz - Retro Arcade action revised
summary: Up for some retro arcade action spiced with extra bullets and BOSS enemies? Shoot your way through many different levels filled with nasty bugs, spiders, frogs, bees and more. Fight huge BOSS enemies and collect extras and play bonus waves. Retro Arcade action at its best!

name: Huckleberry Falls
summary: A new kind of match game! Set in a post apocalyptic world, use your wits and bombs to survive.

name: Hungry Piggy Vs. Chicken
summary:
Hungry piggy vs Chicken: Yes! We are Hungry! We all love the delicious eggs!
Hungry piggy vs Chicken features hours of gameplay, challenging puzzles, and lots of replay value. Each level requires logic and skill to resolve.

name: Hube: Seeker of Achievements
summary: Hube: Seeker of Achievements - is a hardcore-platformer game. Try to open all game levels, and collect all achievements.

name: Hunt With Friends
summary: „Hunt with Friends“ is an online multiplayer hunt game. An open world and many different animals are a symbol of the first game from GamePixelStudios. You can explore a beautiful landscape alone or with your friends.

name: Human Evolution Clicker Game: Rise of Mankind
Hunting on Myths
summary: "Hunting on Myths" is an adventure MMORPG, which plays in the pirate age. Here the player can dive into the open world adventure as part of the Royal Navy, tradesmen or pirates and defend their land against other players or go on a treasure hunt.

name: Hunter Brick Ball
summary:
Hunter brick ball - get a golden brick.
Break the bricks that prevent you from achieving the long-awaited victory.
Hundreds of stages, exciting gameplay.

name: Hungry Piranha Hunting - Shark Spear-fishing world
Hurricane Ship Ghost
summary:
Hurricane Ship Ghost - a game in which you take on the role of captain. In an unequal battle, it is necessary to keep the north from the invaders.
Your task is to sink the main cruisers of the aggressor in order to gain victory and preserve the sovereignty of your lands.
This will help you with the advanced weapons your ship is equipped with. Use missiles and quick-fire weapons to drown enemy ships.

name: Hungry Piggy Donuts Mania
summary: Our little kitties are under hungry to death. The most delicious food, donuts, are in font of kitty’ eyes. Find the best way to feed our hungry kitty! Hungry Kitty Donuts Mania features hours of gameplay, challenging physics-based puzzle, and lots of replay value. Each level requires logic and skill to resolve.

name: Hungry Shadows
summary: In this grim game you have to confront the hordes of zombies, while on a small plot of land. Zombies are constantly attacking our hero.

name: Hungry Dragon
summary:
Hungry Dragon is an action-packed rampage of fire, food and furious fun for mobile devices!

Controlling a ferocious Dragon, you can explore a medieval fantasy world, eating, burning and destroying everything and everyone!

There are tons of unique Dragons to collect, crazy Costumes to equip, and even weird and wacky Pets to accompany your Dragons on their feeding frenzy!

name: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom
summary: Step into the captivating world of Hustle Castle, an engaging mobile game that seamlessly blends strategy, RPG, battle, and base building.

name: Hungry Planet
summary: Build. Eat? Profit. Farm foods on an alien planet and create a restaurant empire!

name: Huge Enemy - Worldbreakers
summary: Huge Enemy - Worldbreakers is a side-scrolling Shootem'Em Up that takes place in a rich environment designed in Full HD. Immerse yourself in a Dark Sci-Fi universe with Japanese influences.

name: Hum Drum Experiences
summary: Take on the role of a person hovering between life and death. Journey through a vibrant world while collecting masks, which help you along in your adventure. Moral ambiguity, questionable ethics and fully-fleshed out characters await in this new RPG adventure.

name: Hunt 'n Sneak
summary: Light is both friend and foe in Hunt ‘n Sneak – a manic party game set in a world where mystical creatures dwell. Threatened by the fearsome Gobblers, the Pixies’ struggle for survival has begun. Will you use your wit to sneak past the Gobblers, or use your cunning to hunt the elusive Pixies?

name: Hunt and Snare
summary: Explore the beautiful archipelago of Skiir; Sail its open seas, roam its deep woods, and sexplore its exotic species. Hunt and Snare to your heart's content.

name: Humphrey (2004)
summary:
Remake of one of Ziggurat's best action games that is basically unknown outside Spain.

Your job, as Humphrey, is to paint the floor of all his house's forty rooms. You simply step on a tile to paint it, but you must be careful not to fall in holes, get electrocuted when stepping on electric tiles, or killed by various enemies. While you cannot attack, you can jump over long distances and change directions in mid-air. There are also special tiles you can step on to help make your job easier. These include the "off" switch for electric tiles, mobile platforms that can move you across vast distances, bombs that kill everything in sight, teleport tiles, and many more. There are also the usual power-up tiles such as health, extra life, and extra points.

name: Huli the Mage
summary: Are you looking for a game both relaxing and adrenalinic? A weird plot with lots of NPCs and monsters to slay? Then, this is the game you are looking for. Beware! Do not get fooled by the nice and happy graphics, it is not as easy as you may think.

name: Human Rocket Person
summary: Human Rocket Person is an absurd & fun platformer where you jump & fly through different levels on your trusted pogo stick using ass-juice as fuel. It’s unbearably hard and by the end of this game, you will never play a platformer again.

name: Hunting Simulator VR
summary: Get your heart racing and blood pumping for the thrill of approaching prey and pulling the trigger with perfect timing and aim. Perfect your hunting skills behind the rifle by practicing on nature's bounty in this virtual reality experience.

name: Hunter's Trial
summary: In the depths of the forest lies the Delain Academy, a school for Monster Hunters, humans with special skills that keep the Earth safe from terrible devastating beasts. On a fateful day, an unexpected attack leaves the fate of the School and humanity in the hands of the most unlikely heroes.

name: Hunter
summary: Hunters to your rifles! Bring out your shooter skills in Hunter and his 3 different game modes!

name: Hunter's Legacy: Purrfect Edition
summary:
Embark on a feline-filled quest set in an action-packed fantasy universe brimming with fierce enemies, intense sword-fighting, and the classic feeling of a Metroidvania adventure! Hunter’s Legacy is a 2D platformer where you control Ikki, a powerful huntress cat equipped with twin swords, a bow, and magical abilities, who must save the Kingdom of Iripur from the evil Morodir.

Hunter’s Legacy Purrfect Edition features new story sequences, more character dialogues, new animations, an updated level design, a brand new mini-map feature, improved melee combat, and a new game plus mode! Explore all regions of this fantastical open world kingdom, from peaceful forests to snowed volcanos, while slashing your enemies with your mighty twin swords, and follow the legacy of the legendary hunter.

name: Hunt them
summary: Hunt them is a survival zombie shooter game in which you are last army man survival and has to stop zombie from kill you and the town.

name: Hunted Gods
summary: Each door leads to a different time, place or dimension. And if the player look a freezer for a long time, for example, then the player will teleport to icy mountains. A potted plant teleport the player to a forest etc..Each dimension reflects the player’s personality test that changes the story and characters.

name: Hunger Apartment
summary: This place is called HUNGER APARTMENT. Not only will it feed and clothe you, but it will also satisfy all your fantasies.

name: Hubris
summary: Hubris is a VR action-adventure game set in the unique and intriguing Hubris sci-fi universe. You will have to use all of your agility and strength to survive the harsh environment and wildlife on a planet which is being terraformed. Along the way you will have to fight like a real OOO agent. You will learn to craft weaponry and control vehicles and machinery. But more than that, you will need all the help you can get, as there are other factions eager to unravel the long-forgotten secrets of the OOO.

name: Hunting fields of Jackals
summary: Drive various of real-world military vehicles that armed with real-world heavy weapons, racing and fighting against other players in a unique PVP+PVE survival mode.

name: Hulala Baby
summary: Hulala Baby, is a leisure game. It tells the story of the heroine's growth from childhood to adulthood. During her growth, she met many interesting people and things.

name: Human Rights
summary: Human Rights is an interactive lyric video / toy, developed as a companion piece to the song 'Human Rights' by Monster Mansion. Players explore a set of scenes and objects that relate to self expression, while listening to the song, which was inspired by the 2017 Australian same-sex marriage vote.

name: Human Sacrifice
summary: When I woke up I was at a ceremonial place. Several deaths await you ahead of your choice to survive. Can you unravel this ceremony's mystery and survive?

name: Human Pinball: Iceage
summary: Immersive-Games brings you:Human Pinball : Iceage

name: Hush: In Search of Dominic Ward
summary: Hush: In Search of Dominic Ward is a co-op, room scale, virtual reality escape room experience. Take on the roles of Sam and his/her/their closest friend as they try to unravel the mystery of what has become of Dominic Ward (Sam's Uncle).

name: Humanitas
summary:
Take the narrative style of a classic childhood gamebook. Give it mature themes, a fantasy setting, and female characters who are primarily strong women. Add insightful dialogue, a striking visual style, existentialism, and plenty of chances to die. 
 
The result is Humanitas.

name: Human: Fall Flat + The Flame in the Flood Bundle
Hungry Baby: Party Treats!
summary: You have one “simple task” – feed the baby. Now how hard can it be? Well any parent will tell you it is hard. Sometimes it can be as hard as trying to keep up with your E3 appointments calendar. Or fighting the last boss in Dark Souls. Or telling your boss you won’t be able to take overtime anymore. And you want a raise. At the very same time. Or… well let’s just agree feeding your baby can be hard. Like really, REALLY hard. And as we all know, because it’s no secret – a hungry baby is an angry baby. All goes bad when it gets mad.

name: Hunters For Your Brain
summary: In the same lab where carried out experiments on the people the disaster occurred.

name: Hunter's Arena: Legends
summary: Monster hunting, leveling, dungeon raiding, party play, PvP and more! In Hunter's Arena, you can expereince all the content you've enjoyed in MMORPGs within a 30 minute match. Choose one of over 10 characters and survive other players, 20 bosses and 10,000 monsters.

name: Hunt the Thailand Hidden
summary: Find all the hidden objects in the room before time runs out. Enjoy a puzzle game which bringing you to discover a Thailand hidden and make you know about Thailand better.

name: Hundred Days
summary: Winemaking could be your best adventure. Make the best wine interacting with soil and nature and take your winery to the top. Your beautiful journey into the winemaking tradition starts now.

name: Hurricane chase
summary: Hurricane chase is a multiplayer (4vs1) Sports game where one player takes on the role of the Tornado, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to destroy the weather controllers or attack the Tornado and avoid being destroyed.

name: Humans 101
summary: Humans 101 is a VR user-generated content creation game with an amusing narrative. Take part in absurd experiments created by misinformed aliens and create your own challenges using the Experiment Builder and compete with other players to top the charts!

name: Humankind
summary: Humankind is a historical strategy game where you will re-write the entire narrative of humankind, a convergence of culture, history, and values that allows you to create a civilization that is as unique as you are. How far will you push humankind?

name: Hunting in Ancient Asia
summary: Highly free shooting game, just walk through the scene, hunting a variety of animals, when the hunting points reach a certain level, you will unlock the brilliant bow effect and arrow tail effect, enjoy hunting now!

name: Hunter's Soul
summary:
This game is a 2D action RPG where hunters fight monsters. 
Defeat enemies with swords and magic and move forward. 
 
If you defeat enemies, your soul will accumulate. 
And you can strengthen your character in the first room. 
You can also learn new techniques by defeating the boss. 
You can confirm the technique and move the place(shortcut) on the menu screen.

name: Humanity
summary: A unique blend of puzzle-solving and action-platforming. Play a lone Shiba Inu charged with commanding massive, marching crowds to the goal in Story Mode, or browse a wide array of user-made levels crafted via the in-game Stage Creator!

name: Hunger Tower
summary: Hunger Tower is an easy strategy action-packed RPG!

name: Hulu Has Live Sports '20: The Video Game
Hueor
summary: Waiting to queue for a long time? Need to kill some time? Want to compare your reflexes with your friends? Well then this is the game for you!

name: Human Factory
summary: Build a factory to store, process and sell Humans. Sell their meat, skin and souls. Become the greatest cosmic space deity in the multiverse.

name: Human Delusion
summary: Human Delusion is a short but impactful story about a transformation from being restrained inside the human experience to being free and present. Human Delusion is an exploration of one’s emotions, consciousness, mind and their perception of reality. Are you ready to choose true Freedom?

name: Human Simulator
summary: Meet Mr Hugh Mann. Hugh loves humans, and he wants to be just like them. Help Hugh to fit in and learn what human life is like by manually moving his head, arms and legs as you work together to explore an array of fun and wacky jobs in the pursuit of helping Hugh to fit and be accepted by all!

name: Humble Rumble
summary: Humble Rumble is a multiplayer physics-based brawling party game spanning several maps, themes and modes. Compete or co-operate with your friends across various activities from battles at sea to farming to gift giving.

name: Humanoid 47
summary: Doctor Leboucher continues his strange experiments on his boarders. Following an explosion, patient E326 managed to flee and shut himself up in the secret laboratory. Can you escape from this strange place where mechanics and flesh seem strangely mixed?

name: Hungry Knight!
summary: Team Cherry presents to you Hungry Knight, a determined little adventurer with a big appetite. Fight your way through a strange wasteland, keep yourself fed every ten seconds, and accomplish a miracle. Others may perish at your hand, but such is the remorselessness of this world.

name: Hue Am I?
summary: A grayscale loner searches for a place to belong by phasing through monochromatic worlds.

name: Huts
summary: Find and build huts while relaxing in the woods. Don't forget to bring your camera!

name: Hungry Tea Party
summary: You're invited to an afternoon of conversation over tea and cake with three strange new friends. RSVP if you dare, and welcome to the tea party!

name: Hunting Simulator 2
summary: With your hunting dog by your side, explore the Texan desert and forests of Colorado and Europe as you track down 33 animal species. Choose your gear from over 160 official weapons, accessories and clothing items (including Browning, Winchester and Bushnell).

name: Hunter Assassin
summary: Control the assassin and hunt down your targets one by one. Use your surroundings and shadows to stay hidden from flashlights.

name: Hungover
summary: A short puzzle game about making your way home.

name: Hunt the Muglump
summary: Retro-inspired dungeon crawling adventure

name: Human Farm
summary: Welcome to Human Farm – an alternate, Orwellian world where Pigs became the dominant species. Humans are degraded to farmed meat. Create and develop your own slaughterhouse. Your goal: conquer and dominate the human meat industry. Millions of hungry snouts are waiting to be fed!

name: Hunt Planet Bug
summary: FPS game, with 2 levels of difficulty, and with four scenes. you will have to hunt animals from another planet and prevent them from hunting you ati. in the final scene you will have to arrive An enemy ship to destroy it.

name: Human
summary:
Somewhere between sanity and madness lies a realm torn between the two. Illusions become reality, and reality becomes nothing more than a vision.

Human is a short psychological horror game which examines inherent, earthly, and otherworldly evils, and the forces which drive them. As you make your way through an Alaskan auroral research facility in search of employees it quickly becomes very clear that something has become alerted to your presence. Suspiciously, once it knows you're there, you're more than welcome to be there. Drawing you in, you soon begin to question all you see and hear.

HUMAN is highly metaphorical, yet accessible. All is explained in it's simplest essence, but for those willing to look beyond the surface, there lies layer upon layer of symbolism, and clues regarding the nature of reality, which add depth to the meaning behind Human.

Human is primarily story and experience driven, however environmental puzzles and problem solving are interlaced within. You will also use observation to find what's necessary in order to progress. Tablets throughout the facility contain research notes which you can zoom in on and read which help give further context to the story.

name: Hunckie Egg
summary: A platform game where you need to collect eggs while dodge enemies.

name: Hunter's Moon Remastered
summary:
Originally released in 1987, Hunter's Moon is a strategic shoot 'em up set in deep space. Beautifully presented and thoughtfully designed, the game became an instant classic thanks to its measured balance of strategic planning and psychotic blasting. Boasting one of the earliest uses of procedurally-generated content in a computer game, Hunter's Moon pushed the boundaries of the genre and helped redefine what a shoot 'em up could be.

Hunter’s Moon Remastered is a fully remastered, overhauled, and updated version of the seminal C64 shoot ‘em up. The game has been remastered for C64 cartridge and boasts a host of amazing new features including over 50 new levels, 5 new star systems, new level types, new music, new playing modes, stunning intro and outro sequences, built-in level editor, and enhanced presentation including foreign language support.

name: Hugo: The Magic Journey
summary: During this magical journey, Trak and Geo visit more than 20 countries. Geo help her to play with us and with the tasks we have to complete. At the same time, he tells various interesting facts about the countries they visit. Playing Magic Journey you can paint flags and compose exotic music, embody the detective and help pigeons in mail delivery.

name: HubWorld
summary: A relaxing first-person exploration game with a focus on visual design, novelty, and ease of use.

name: Hungry Boy
summary: Hungry Boy is an adventure platformer shooter in which you have to destroy enemies, overcome various obstacles, collect food and find a way out of the level.

name: Hugh's Dream
summary: A platformer featuring Hugh, whose stats during each dream are determined by the conversations he has the night before with his friends.

name: Human Errors
summary: A contractor assigned to handle bug reports for a wearable mood-regulation device becomes unwitting witness to trauma and crime.

name: Human Resource Machine Deluxe
summary:
More puzzles, more humans, more rippling brain muscles - over 60+ levels of programming puzzles! 77.777778% more levels than Human Resource Machine.
A whole new programming language to enjoy! Where Human Resource Machine was based on Assembly and executed by a single worker, 7 Billion Humans has an all-new language that lots of workers can all execute at the same time.
You'll be taught everything you need to know. Even useless skills can be put to work!
Feeling stressed out? There are now friendly hint and "skip" systems to facilitate your career's ascent.
Incomprehensible cutscenes! You will be delighted and bewildered.

name: Huuma Mina: The Secret of Immortality
summary: In legend, Huuma Mina is an immortal ninja with silver hair and silver eyes. A mad scientist, Arakawa Murasaki, tries to capture her in order to research her secret of immortalization. However, will Murasaki succeed in her study? Will science be able to reveal the secret of immortalization?

name: Hunters All Star Battle
summary: 2D action where successive characters of HUNTERS fight.

name: Hunt in Town
summary: Gather 6 to 20 players around a campfire and depending on your role in the game, hunt down werewolves that have infiltrated the group, devour innocent villagers, or even end up as the only survivor to win the game.

name: Hungry Cat Mahjong HD
summary: Mahjong with cat and kittens

name: Husbandry
summary: As an entrepreneur from a far away galaxy, raise and breed the exotic creatures of Earth, then sell them back to your home world.

name: Humankind: Day One Edition
summary:
The Day One Edition of HUMANKIND includes:
- Humankind game
- Notre Dame DLC Pack
- Digital Soundtrack
- Boudicca Avatar Set (DLC)
- Player Profile Items

name: Human: Fall Flat - Anniversary Edition
summary:
Human fall Flat is a light-heart, hilarious platformer set in a world of floating dreamscapes. Each dream level provides a new environment to navigate, from mansions, castles and aztec adventures to snowy mountains, eerie nightscapes and Industrial locations. Multiple routes through each level, and perfectly pitched puzzles ensure exploration and ingenuity are rewarded.

The Anniversary Edition includes the base game + all content updates to date.

name: Hunting Unicorn
summary: A maiden leads a unicorn hunt.

name: Hunt for the Shadow Rider
summary: A rogue Shadow Rider has escaped to the year 2078. You are the only Hunter left who can take him down.

name: Hula Wii: Hula de Hajimeru - Bi to Kenkou!
summary: In Hula Wii: Hula de Hajimeru - Bi to Kenkou! by utilizing the Wii Balance Board, players can take Hula lessons right in front of the television and learn how to shake, gesticulate, and dance like a native Hawaiian. In addition to the tutorials, the software also includes footage of dancers doing the Hula in the classic style. A video travelogue developed with the participation of the Hawaii Tourism Authority is also included on the Wii DVD which shows off the sights and natural beauty of Hawaii.

name: Hunt N Cloak
summary: Hunt N Cloak is an online multiplayer game with a fantastic fun old skool element of "Hide & Seek" Set in a variety of environments including Outdoor desert, Internal Office, Vehicle Garage & Old Towns, you embark as either the Hunt

name: Hungry Hearts Diner: A Tale of Star-Crossed Souls
summary:
A cozy narrative-driven diner sim where you run a small family restaurant on the city’s edge, cooking home-style Japanese dishes like rice balls, dumplings, and tempura.
Serve colorful customers, unlock new recipes as you cook, and learn their poignant, interwoven stories through conversations sparked by full bellies, an intimate mix of hands-on cooking mechanics and heartfelt, sometimes bittersweet storytelling.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Hungry Hearts Diner: A Tale of Star-Crossed Souls

name: Hustle City
summary: Hustle City is a story-driven, cycling game that rewards fitness, creativity and nerves of steel. Ride hot lines through city traffic as you rush to drop off packages and meet tight delivery times. Whether you visit for a day or a week, Hustle City will be your escape from a tired smart trainer routine.

name: Human Diaspora
summary: An action packed sci-fi First Person Shooter. Fight for humanity, conquer the colony planet. Use your arsenal to fight enemy infantry and expand your territory. Discover and traverse land, sea and space environments with non-stop battle and perils everywhere.

name: Human or Virus
summary: Two years after the outbreak of the new coronavirus, the virus has mutated. You will lead your team to face a group of zombies, intelligent robots and various mutant beasts.

name: Hunt: Primal Reptiles
summary:
An unusual adventure in a jungle full of dangers! The game combines elements of a classic hunting simulator and survival. You traverse a vast, open world full of life and realistic fauna. Apart from many dinosaur species, different dangers await you, such as huge mosquitoes and poisonous plants. You will meet a lot of prehistoric reptiles. From small, agile specimen to powerful giants weighing tonnes.

You will have a huge island from the Cretaceous Period at your disposal. Each traveled meter will be a test of survival! You will find a piece of a basic, random equipment. To survive, you have to conquer the world in search of a better weapon, technology, ammo.

The island, where you are located, is inhabited (In early access, in the future we plan to add more dinosaur) by 5 different dinosaur species. From blood-thirsty Tyrannosaurus to small and agile Velociraptors. Choose your target carefully, find enough ammo, and stuff.

name: Humpty's Scramble
summary:
This game was made to promote the western-Canadian family restaurant chain "Humpty's" and their Kids' Club.  
 
In this 1998 DOS platformer, Humpty must rescue his little buddy Hammlet from an evil wizard by traversing various areas including a forest, a marine cave, a mountain, and a maze-like castle. 
 
The game was sold and distributed for free at certain locations. Despite having a rather limited release, it impressively touted pre-rendered 3D visuals and a first-person 3d maze in its final area.

name: Hurt
summary: Hurt is a large Doom map to be played with GZDoom

name: Hunter's Moon
summary: Welcome to The Temple Of The Portals, and prepare to fight hordes upon hordes of giant monstrosities from Hell for the control of the Multiverse. Hunter's Moon is the mod for Zandronum and GZDoom to create the single-player campaign Quake 3 Arena never had. The story continues eons after the Vadrigars' extinction, with the Arena Warriors fighting to protect the Temple Of The Portals, the place where every universe connects, a source of unlimited and unimaginable power not just one Hell, but a coalition from many of them from various universes is trying to conquer. Featuring advanced graphics for a Doom mod, an entirely original gameplay style, and a roster comprised of the most beloved Quake 3 characters.

name: Hunting Challenge
summary: Hunting Challenge and its new accessory (a hinged barrel hunting gun using the nunchuck and the wiimote) take up the challenge of making you live or relive the experience of real hunting in plains or swamps, with an immersion and reality quality never before achieved. With your weapon in your hand, binoculars hung around your neck, decoy in your pocket, and a hunting dog obeying your every order, move around in beautiful surroundings and get to know each species (whether they can be hunted or not) along with their favorite territories, habits and behaviors. Proximity, noise, weather conditions and wind direction are all settings that should be taken into account when planning to go hunting, while complying with all the hunting laws currently in effect. Main Features: * A new accessory imitating a real hunting gun (the barrel must be broken open in order to reload it!) * The first real hunting simulation on a new generation console * 2 kinds of hunting: Aquatic game hut hunting and hunting in plains. * Ball-Trap mode in bonus! * Set up your hunt according to your preferences: Hunting zones, weather conditions (mist, fog, rain), time of day. * Be attentive to the wind direction so that you don't alert the game. * Direct your hunting dog like you would do in reality! * 18 different hunting areas to choose from. * 11 species with explanations and advice for each of them: Mallard, coypu, deer, boar, stag, fox, goose, partridge, snipe, pheasant, rabbit… * A significant amount of information on current hunting laws.

name: Hunter: Avendzer Dragon
summary: RPG Maker Game made by Kitabake

name: Hunt for Treasure
summary: Hunt for Treasure it's a hidden object game in which you inherit the company of your grandfather after he mysteriously disappears.

name: Huntfeast
summary:
Prepare for the Werewolf Hunt!
Misanthrope’s curse echoes through the woods of Lovengrad. Terrible monsters, led by the werewolf, hunt for their prey. An oppressive atmosphere paired with the thrill of hunting makes this game unlike any other. Begin the Huntfeast, where you are a hunter who hunts alone or with a friend.

name: Hunt
summary: Hunt is a sandbox hunting simulator game where the goal is to hunt as many game in 15 minutes. Your hunding gear includes a sniper rifle, 9mm pistol, shotgun, revolver and a semi-automatic machine gun With so many different kinds of animals to hunt no game will be the same Pick the time to go hunting, If you hunt during the afternoon beware of the bears wandering around, they will attack you and if you are hunting during the night beware of wild attacking wolf packs. The animals you can hunt are randomly created in different sizes and colors and sizes and your score is based on the kind of animal and its size and colour.

name: Human Vs Evil
summary: A few years later, Crix found that the place where he originally lived was occupied by alien species, and decided to call on the remaining humans to take home together!!!

name: Humanless
summary: Play as a super skilled combatant, with superhuman speed and agility. Fight against merciless demons, while dashing and jumping to dodge evil traps through carefully designed levels.

name: Humans Took My Neighbors!
summary: Humans took my neighbors is a 2D top down action game, you’ll go through the neighborhoods saving as many monsters as you can, fighting humans ready to take every monster they see, and as you progress through the levels maybe find the cause for this invasion.

name: Human Origin
summary: The most important to play this game is to wear a headphone !The built-in videos is not only a game play tutorial, but also an interesting story. which is an hour long .and full of suspense,laughs,pains in it

name: HuoChaiRenRPG
summary: "Matchman RPG" is a self-made RPG role-playing game.

name: Human vs Monster
summary: "Human vs Monster" is a tower defense game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. You need to use humans reasonably to deal with monsters with different characteristics. There are at most five levels for each human or monster, which are-common, advanced, legend, antiquity, and creation.

name: Hunt the Night
summary: Plunge into a retro-style action-adventure game that combines a fast, skilled gameplay with dark fantasy and lore. Play as Vesper, a virtuous member of 'The Stalkers,' and explore the vast world of Medhram, filled with ruins and horrors.

name: Huntdown: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Huntdown Collector's Edition includes:

Huntdown physical game
Collector's Box with sleeve
John Sawyer action figure
Three button pins
Four embroidered gang patches
A 50+ page art book
The soundtrack on cassette
A reversible 18"x24" poster

name: Human Guise
summary:
In Human Guise, you, along with FBI agents, will have to investigate a series of brutal murders, find the culprit and put an end to this nightmare. However, the solution may be very unexpected.

A dark point&click adventure where you become Ada Thornton, an FBI agent. She and her partner will investigate a series of murders in a small town. They are both professionals, focused and well-prepared. But don't forget that they are just people, with their own stories, secrets and fears. Get to know the locals, interrogate them and remember that everyone you meet may not be who they seem at first sight.
Investigate the case, uncover the truth, whatever it may be, but remember - you may regret it, this investigation will irrevocably change the lives of the protagonists.

name: Husky's Adventures
summary: Husky's Adentures, 3D Cute Platformer Game.

name: Hunger in Paradise
summary: This is a casual game about Paradise - island where people are always starving. To get some food the player should point and click on correct letters to build the names of food.

name: Humans Vs Ghouls
summary: Humans Vs Ghouls is an online top-down shooter following survivors of a ghoul apocalypse that blast foes to live another day.

name: Humanity: First Woman In Space
summary: Explore space, empathy, diversity. Feel how it is to be somebody else. Humanity transports you into the body of the first woman to go into space.

name: Hunter Shooting Camp
summary: Train you shooting and hunting skills in this ultimate shooter game. Hunt in Forest or train in the numerous skills levels, challenge AI opponents in Shooting Battles.

name: Hunter of the Disowned
summary: Hunter Of The Disowned is a procedural dungeon adventure video game in which you embody a tragic hero who must fight against destiny in a world ruled by Gods of nature an slaved animals.

name: Huge
summary: HuGe is a logical platformer game with jumps, rotation and reduction.

name: Hungry Bunny
summary: Hungry rabbit - A bright platformer about a hungry rabbit who seeks to collect all the carrots scattered across numerous levels to satisfy his hunger.

name: Hunt the Lights
summary: Hunt the Lights is a arcade clicker game, a hunt for highscore. Play tactical to break your own highscore. It is fast, it is hard.

name: Human-Like
summary: You've arrived onboard the Tenjin research station in deep space. Your mission: sabotage the station's core reactors without getting caught. Sounds easy? Think again. It watches every move you make. It learns from you. And it will kill you.

name: Hustle Game
summary: The player controls a small platform that can be moved horizontally from one wall to the other, placing it under the ball, preventing it from falling down.

name: Hundun
summary: First-person shooter adventure game 3D shooting, platform jumping, adventure puzzle solving Have a great gun shooting experience

name: Huge Breast Princess Knight Anne
summary: Huge breasts are nothing but a bother for a knight... this is an RPG about a huge breasted princess-knight who struggles for the sake of her country and her family.

name: Hunt Royale
summary:
The hunt is on! Enter the hunting grounds as one of 4 warriors and survive in combat against awesome and unique fantasy enemies!

Unlock and learn to play 30+ unique characters with their own skills and abilities. Level them up as you progress, making them stronger for future matches. Try out new builds while unlocking different skills each time you play!

The trick is... You not only have to survive - you have to hunt down more enemies than other players. Only with carefully considered character build and a lot of skill you will be able to achieve that.

It's endless variety - endless fun! Choose between close combat, range combat, magic, brute force, good, evil and everything in between!

Find your favorite character and use it in awesome combat scenarios introduced regularly in unpredictable events.

name: Hunter Girls
summary: Hunter Girls is an action-packed 2D running platformer. Prince Alex has been kidnapped, and now three beautiful girls set out to rescue him. Each has a different reason for starting this adventure that you will discover as you meet each; adventurous Agnes, stern Kim, and shy Flora.

name: Hunted: Kobayashi Tower
summary: Work your way through the skyscraper to rescue your wife from terrorists in the digital adaptation of this solo card game. Manage the central row of cards, balancing when to hide and when to push your luck, collecting items and weapons, risking a fight, as you race against the clock.

name: Humans V Zombies
summary: Play Humans Versus Zombies, a new kind of battle royal FPS. There are three distinct game modes, survival mode, get to the objective, last man standing.

name: Huni Kuin: Yube Baitana
summary: This game was developed together with the Huni Kuin (Kaxinawá) Indians from the Jordan River, in the Amazon, Acre, Brazil, in order to address the culture of the Kaxinawá indigenous people (or Huni Kuin, as they call themselves). It enables an experience of exchanging indigenous knowledge and memories through the language of video games.

name: Hunting Simulator 2: Elite Edition
summary: The Elite Edition of Hunting Simulator 2 includes the full game and all additional content.

name: Hunting Simulator 2: Bear Hunter Edition
summary: This edition includes the base game, bear hunting licences, and 6 exclusive clothing items and weapons.

name: Hunter Hearts
summary: Have you ever had that feeling of looking back in the past? Well, Hunter Hearts is about the past of the protagonist, before the tragedy happend. Find out in this visual novel what he's been going through.

name: Hunting Moon vol.2
summary: When I received a life-size puppet, I thought it was a prank, but the puppet moved suddenly...

name: Hugo: Bukkazoom
summary: Hugo: Bukkazoom! is a 3D racing game based starring Hugo the TV Troll, a popular cartoon character on Danish television. In this game Hugo is shrunk to the size of little green creatures called greenflies. He must race a kart through marshes, deserts and various landscapes. The circuits have checkpoints, upgrades and a scoring system open to different possible strategies. Both single-player and multiplayer games for up to two players are supported.

name: Hush Hush: Only Your Love Can Save Them
summary: A Visual Novel with a twist - improve skills, charm girls, and learn dangerous secrets... by any means necessary.

name: Humankind: Limited Edition
summary:
Humankind Limited Edition (Amazon Exclusive Steelbook) includes:
- PC copy of the game
- Limited Edition Steel Case
- Two-sided "Decision" Coin
- HUMANKIND Digital Soundtrack
- Double-sided Unit & Tech Tree Poster
- HUMANKIND Notre-dame Pack
- Victor Hugo Avatar Set
- Boudicca Avatar Set
- Player Profile Decorations & Symbol Set

name: Hunt: Showdown - Bayou Wraith
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary weapons: Teche Wraith (Legendary Hunter), Wraith’s Hand (Springfield Compact Striker), and Verbena (Knife).

name: Hunt: Showdown - Through the Bone Briar
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter (Cain), a Legendary Winfield M1873C Vandal Striker (Nightmare), and a Legendary Specter 1882 Bayonet (Bone Briar).

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Legends of the Bayou
summary: The Legends of the Bayou DLC dives deep into the bayou’s dark heart to initiate the full release of Hunt: Showdown and provide those loyal to the cause with two new Legendary Hunter characters, two unique weapons, and 500 Blood Bonds.

name: Hundred Days: Grape Lab
summary: Grape Lab is a tool that allows you to create customized grape varieties and wines that can be used in game.

name: Hungry Fish
summary: Hungry fish - an unusual endless adventure as a restless insatiable mysterious fish that feeds on its counterparts. Change your appearance over and over again and consume as many fish as possible to reach new records!

name: Humans Connect
summary: Humans Connect is an Adventure, Hack and Slash Game that is being developed by one person. This game is a journey of the main protagonist "Julia" discoveries of an incident while confronting an Anubis-like Character named "Inpu The Jackal".

name: Hurry Up!
summary: Hurry UP! is a casual game where you can play with your friends and other people. Be ready for a game that will charm you in with entertaining mechanics and atmospheric views.

name: Hustomten
summary: Collect snacks to keep your resident house elf happy until midnight of Christmas Eve.

name: Hunting Moon
summary: Before Yoru try to end his own life, a succubus girl named Lilith appeared.

name: Hunger
summary: Hunger in Los Angeles is an immersive journalistic experience set in the heart of the city, where the indigent are trying to survive on an over-strained food distribution system. By embedding audio that was captured from the First Unitarian Church in an immersive 3D Unity scene, we become witness to a distressing event that unfolds.

name: Hunted
summary: A survival horror game where you must survive inside a deep, dark cave with no clear way out. Hunting you is a hungry cave bear. Using your ears alone, you must keep your paltry lantern's light alive by collecting oil, and if you're lucky, you might get out with the help of your trusty shotgun.

name: Humankind: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Discover Humankind, a Historical Strategy game where YOU will create your own civilization and re-write the entire narrative of human history. How far will you push Humankind?

The Digital Deluxe edition of the game includes:
- Humankind digital game
- Humankind digital soundtrack (.mp3)
- Unit & Tech tree poster (.pdf)
- Humankind Notre-Dame pack and more!

name: Hunger Dungeon: New Challenger Pack
summary: The new challenger coming...

name: Hungry Horace
summary: 8-bit hero Horace is often considered the unofficial mascot of the ZX Spectrum. In later years he’d go skiing and battle spiders, but the 1982 game Hungry Horace – now remastered on Steam for your gaming pleasure – saw him run around a maze eating flowers, ringing alarms and avoiding angry parkies.

name: Hunter X: Begin
summary: Hunter X: Begin is a stylish action game using the sword.

name: Hungry Dino
summary: Have you ever realized that you are ready to eat a horse? Help the little dinosaur to eat with various tasty treats, and do not become a delicacy yourself.

name: Hundred Chances
summary: Challenging 2D Platformer - The Game will test your strength and abiliity ! Can you make your way to the top ?

name: Hunting Simulator 2: A Ranger's Life
summary: In this new scripted campaign, join Dexter in his daily duties as a forest ranger.

name: Hungry Hearts Diner 2: Moonlit Memories
summary:
In Hungry Hearts Diner 2, be the boss of a small eatery in a quiet
corner of 1960's Tokyo. This casual restaurant management sim
comes jam-packed with stories, and you'll have a chance to both
catch up with old friends and meet new faces.

Grandma's back with an all-new diner location but the same
delicious cooking...and a few new recipes, to boot!
Taste popular classics like curry, ramen, and miso soup, but
don't forget to browse our selection of more retro and traditional
Japanese foods like natto, nikujaga, and okonomiyaki as well.
We've got a huge selection of tasty treats, and yes, even the
undisputed emperor of Showa sweets—fruit parfait!

But you're not just here for the food, right?
...Right?

Okay, you are, but so is everyone, at first.
Stay awhile, however, and Grandma's garrulous manner
will soon have you as chatty as her other regulars.
They're an odd bunch, and they all seem to have their
share of troubles. But after the third bowl of miso soup or so,
they'll open up and reveal their stories, both joyous and sad.

Strap in for an all-new set of tales, with some surprising
twists and turns along the way. And remember, everyone's
got that one special meal they can just never forget.

name: HumanitZ
summary: HumanitZ is a co-op, top-down, open world survival game in a world ended by the zombie outbreak. As one of the few human survivors, try to last as long as “humanly” possible. The past can’t be changed, but you can make a difference today and for the future of humanity.

name: Human Madness
summary: Human Madness is a multiplayer survivor game , you can customize your character and the weapons

name: Hundreds of Mysteries: Season1
summary: Every case has a story behind it! You need to find and collect clues in the scene and reason at every level to find the truth. The clues can be associated or cross-layered.

name: Hue^2
summary: Hue² is a puzzle game, which brings calmness, peace, and a sense of harmony. You need to place the colored cubes in a harmonious way in the gradient. The locked cubes are not moveable and they will be your guide. It seems that it is a piece of cake, right? Well, the beginning levels are really easy to pass, but on the other hand, when the number of locked cubes and the number of colorful cubes increase, the game becomes more interesting and challenging. 377 levels will challenge your logic and sense of color.

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Kid
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter (The Kid) and two Legendary Caldwell Conversion Pistols (Ember and Ash), ideal for dual wielding.

name: Hugs
summary: Hug your friends!

name: Huncho
summary: Defeat your enemies and find your treasure!

name: Hungry Ducks
summary:
A small game for Haunted PS1 Summer Of Screams.

It's a game about feeding monster ducklings. If there is no food... you become the food!!!

The spoopiness in this one is lagging a bit though. I hope you enjoy it anyway :)

The game does not yet have a propper ending, because I had to finish it in a very small amout of time.

If the mouse sensitivity feels off for some reason, I reccomend downloading the standalone build. There seems to be a weird bug with the mouse sensitivity.

name: Hush Little Lily
summary: A point-and-click, exploration horror game

name: Hupsi
summary: Super adorable musical adventure

name: Hunt, Hunter, Hunted
summary: HHH is a short rpg game filled with mystery that you have to figure out as each day go by. Who is there to trust?

name: Hurtful Tower
summary: Hurtful Tower (also known as Harmful Tower) is a roguelike presented in the traditional Quikding style. The player must travel through 100 crudely-drawn, randomly-generated levels while collecting food and avoiding obstacles. All of the scenery is deadly and the player dies with only a single touch.

name: Humans Are Pattern Finders
summary: A bit about where I am. TW: talks about psychosis, specifically delusions. Use the mouse to join the dots(or stars, up to you), and the arrow keys to navigate around the map. A game to remember where I've been and where I am, and hold the feeling I had when I came out of therapy and realized I might just be ok.

name: Hugs
summary: You are a monster that really wants to hug everyone you see. The problem is that people tend to run away from you.

name: Husk
summary: HUSK is a short, atmospheric horror game taking you through the story of Dr. Shoal, as you uncover his past, and the horror that awaits in his decrepit home.

name: Hungro Seal
summary: A hungry baby harp seal needs to feed!

name: Hugbot
summary: Use the power of hugging to defeat robots!

name: Humorpractor
summary: Balance humors in an unstable patient.

name: Hunger of The Elder Slime
summary: Tred lightly lest you wake the Elder Slime!

name: Humanity Is Dead
summary: A third-person action shooter where you are facing a war between humans and robots.

name: Hungry Fox
summary: Side Scroll Endless Runner

name: Hug me I'm cold
summary: Survive your FIRST DATE on the Final Day on Earth!

name: Hungry Harry 3D
summary: 3D Platforming from the 80s!

name: Hungry Frog
summary: The swamp has no more food! Adventure outwards to find food for Hungry Frog

name: Humanities Legend: Hollow Ascending
summary: A challenging yet forgiving souls-like action adventure. Parry, block, and dodge enemy attacks while exploring a ruined fort. Discover rich lore and epic boss fights.

name: Hue change
summary: An arcade-y puzzlescript game about creating and changing cubes colours

name: Humanity Walks Into a Bar
summary: A colorful people simulator that puts all of humankind inside a bar

name: Hurry Hurry Heal Me
summary: Local Co-Op Heal 'Em Up

name: Hungry Frog
summary: A game about eating bugs and dodging stingers! An entry into the Mini Jam 79: Frogs Jam.

name: Hunt
summary:
Hunt is a sandbox hunting simulator game where the goal is to hunt as many game in 15 minutes.

Your hunding gear includes a sniper rifle, 9mm pistol, shotgun, revolver and a semi-automatic machine gun

name: Hundred Days: Napa Valley
summary: Explore the napa valley region and its grape varieties. Continue your journey in the winemaking world and prove to be the best.

name: Hungry Birds
summary: Hungry Birds - Addictive 2D Physics, Slingshot, game with unique puzzles, sceneries, destructible objects and weather effects.

name: Humankind: Cultures of Africa
summary: Expand your Humankind experience with the Cultures of Africa DLC! Experience thousands of years of rich history from the world's second largest continent, home to over 1 billion people and 1500 languages. Cultures of Africa features six new cultures, new natural and built wonders, 7 independent peoples, and 15 new narrative events.

name: Hutaoriji: Emoji Girl Menhera
summary: Japanese meme girl Menhera is coming! From now on, she'll travel with you! Joy in daily life, she unlocks more surprises for you!

name: Huckleberry Fields Forever
summary: Huckleberry Fields Forever is a co-op mystery action-platformer. Track thieves in scenic real-world locales, run and jump through procedurally generated levels assembled from hundreds of handcrafted challenges, gather clues, interview witnesses, uncover secrets... but can you solve the case in time?

name: Hunt-or-Haunt
summary: Hunt-or-Haunt is a 6 to 12 player online game where two teams, Hunters and Haunts, face-off in pandemonius battles of elimination! As Hunters combine forces to uncover and dispatch their ghostly foes, Haunts use their stealth and trickery to divide and conquer. Eliminate your opponents to win!

name: Hunkenstein
summary: The most fearsome monsters of classic cinema are now common household pests. You're the new exterminator in town. Unlicensed, of course. Shoot, crush, burn, or mulch these physics-based ghouls, then collect the check.

name: Humankind in a nutshell
summary: Humankind in a nutshell is a 4X strategy game based on slot mechanisms. Beginning from the Ancient era, you have to feed your tribe and fight against barbarians, study new technology to develop your nation. Build various types of facilities which will help your nation grow to achieve victory.

name: Hunt Souleater
summary: Hunt Souleater is a PvPvE third-person shooter that 60 players are devided into hunter and souleater camps. Hunters besiege the Stramon Island where souleaters haunt to kill the souleaters and destroy the temple.

name: Hungry Wolf
summary: This is very interesting and very cool horror game Hungry Wolf. Where to fend off a dire hungry wolf with a slingshot. You only need to hold out for 3 minutes for winning game. Good luck player and good game.

name: Human vs Food
summary: Human vs Food is a challenging action platformer game set in a world where food has taken over the world. In battle, you will have to destroy food a lot and skillfully. Explore 100 levels, play as 6 different characters with different skills. Save the world!

name: Hunters' Path: Rebirth
summary: Hunters' Path: Rebirth is an on-foot shooter, pitting a ragtag but devout squad of Knights, Outlaws, Mages, and Samurai against the evils of a fantasy world full of destroyable scenery.

name: Hungry Ball Physics
summary: Hungry ball physics is a physics puzzle game where you need to draw lines to lead the ball to the sweets. You have to overcome obstacles and hurdles in over 99 brain teasing Levels.

name: Hunter A Hunter
summary: Hunter A Hunter is an Action Horror Arena game inspired by Pacman. Instead of eating pills while hiding from ghosts with top-down view, Hunter A Hunter is you (as a sinner) playing first/third-person view to collect all lights scattered in arena while a hunter is searching for you.

name: Hungry Zombies
summary: Hungry Zombies is a defense of the city, 2D graphics with a side view, colorful and beautiful graphics and unforgettable experiences.

name: Huntress: The Cursed Village
summary: Returning to her village from a hike, the Huntress finds it under a curse! Join the Huntress and battle exciting Match-3 challenges to overwhelm the curse and save the village.

name: Hum
summary: Hum is a dark 2D adventure game with stealth and horror elements set in the bleak, retro-futuristic world of Postapoland. You discover that you cannot die, forever trapped in a nightmarish reality. Explore the world in ever shifting perspectives, reach the reality engine and finally die.

name: Human Apocalypse
summary: A new virus is turning people into brain eating machines, etc. You know the rest. A cure has been found and all the infected people are now normal humans again. What is the problem then? Their skin color is still green. Play as an Ex-Zombie.

name: Hua Mulan: A Chinese Learning Adventure
summary: Travel back in time to help defend Hua Mulan against evil time bandits all while learning Chinese in this story-driven, role-playing, open 3D world episodic adventure.

name: Human Cargo
summary:
Yoshi Garcia is stuck in a rut, professionally and personally... until he finds himself kidnapped by alien pirates. At first opportunity, he escapes, stowing away aboard a cargo freighter, where he hopes to hide out until he can sneak off the ship. Unfortunately for Yoshi, he's immediately discovered by the freighter crew.

Kol is the gruff warrior who commands the ship. Razix, the red-skinned flirty Regulan, is the ship's hot-shot pilot. Zed, the furry Zaurian beast, is the security chief. Nasir, the territorial human, keeps the ship's systems running. And finally, Doc, the intelligent blue-skinned Sargan, keeps the crew patched up.

Help Yoshi find adventure and romance (and hot sex) amongst the stars!

Human Cargo features male/male situations and is intended for mature audiences.

name: Humans vs. Tigers
summary: Your goal is to increase your team of hunters until you reach the tiger. Gather them but be very careful in same time to the very dangerous obstacles that you will encounter in your way.

name: Hunted
summary: Hunted is a free to play game in which you are the last survivor of an alien invasion, you must attack and destroy alien ovals that try and kill you. You can build, craft, and explore.

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star
summary: Hundred Fires is an action, stealth and infiltration game with an exciting story and incredible cinematics. This is a one man infiltration mission, you alone cannot defeat the entire Soviet army, you must use your best skills to hide, sneak away from the enemy and go undetected.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Cold Blooded
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary weapons: The Reptilian (Legendary Hunter), Avarice (Romero 77 Talon), and Tooth to Tail (Bomb Lance).

name: Hunt: Showdown - Meridian Turncoat
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter (The Turncoat), two Legendary weapons (Dolch 96 pair Crossfire & Ambush), and one Legendary Ammo Box (Red Cask).

name: HunterX
summary: HunterX is an action-adventure game full of spirited battles. Use various styles of weapons and magic to experience your own fighting style and explore a great world.

name: Hungry Animals
summary: Give donuts to hungry animals! Make a lot of donuts for the animals according to the order in which they are cooked. Good Luck!

name: Hunyadi Strategy
summary: Hunyadi is a hexagonal strategy game based on a historical character John Hunyadi from the 15th Century. He was one of the greatest military mind of his age. He lead military campaigns mostly against the rising Ottoman empire.

name: Humans vs. Vampires
summary: Based off of the movie and tv series “My Babysitter’s A Vampire”

name: Human Heroes Curie on Matter
summary:
Time travel with Marie Curie and discover facts about her spellbinding life.
You will be taught by the first double Nobel prize-winning scientist herself through a collection of captivating mini-games and interactive stories on topics such as the states of matter (a National Curriculum learning area), radioactivity, particle physics, what an atom is, and the chemical refinement process.

name: Hunter Island: Monsters & Dragons
summary:
Hunter Island is a real monster collection RPG with live multiplayer.
Awaiting you is a vast world to explore and an epic story. Suffering from war, drought, and other unusual disasters, the island is going through troubled times, and the people living there are in need of a hero like you. In order to put a stop to these disasters, you must uncover the secrets behind the disappearance of ancient civilizations.
Do you have what it takes to stop the evil plot to awaken the destructive force buried beneath the island!?

name: Hungry
summary: A short dolphin adventure.

name: Humankind: Cultures of Latin America
summary: The Humankind Cultures of Latin America DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders- 9 Independent Peoples- 15 Narrative Events- 30+ New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Hunter Survivors
summary: Demons have been destroying our villages for centuries, choose your adventurer and destroy them, in this rogue lite you will face thousands of monsters. Buy new weapons and upgrades as the raid progresses to be strong and kill even more demons.

name: Hugo
summary: Hugo, the well known European TV troll makes his appearance on PlayStation.

name: Humankind: Heritage Edition
summary:
Humankind is a historical strategy game, where you'll be re-writing the entire narrative of human history and combining cultures to create a civilization that's as unique as you are.

The Heritage Edition includes:
(Physical release only)
- Q-Card Cover
- Double-sided Unit & Tech Tree Poster

(Physical & Digital release)
- Notre-Dame Pack
- Cultures of Africa Pack
- Cultures of Lain America Pack
- Edgar Allen Poe & Boudicca Avatar Sets & Player Icons
- Exclusive Player Profile Decoration & Symbols Set

name: Humankind: Collection
summary:
The Humankind: Collection includes:
- Humankind Main Game
- Cultures of Africa DLC
- Notre-Dame Pack
- Humankind - Digital Deluxe Upgrade

name: Hunt for Junk
summary: Hunt for Junk is a retro Platformer that follows the graphical limitations of the classic Gameboy (e.g. 4 colors and a 160x144px resolution). Journey the world in your unending pursuit of delicious Junkfood! Avoid traps, fight enemies, collect coins and discover all of the hidden Junkfood items!

name: Humdle
summary: You're in a dark room. you have to escape from here but.. can't see anything!!

name: Hungry Pigs
summary: Become a pig and eat all the cabbage you can!

name: Hungry Galaxies
summary: Hungry Galaxies is a deadly space survival game. Seek out constellations of Star Matter to grow your mass and evolve, increasing your gravity and gaining new abilities. But watch out! Space is a dangerous place.

name: Hummingbird's Crown
summary: What would you do if you were stuck in a time loop?

name: HuntForOut
summary: HuntForOut is a survival FPS game, where your main goal is to get out from The Labyrinth before it collapses. The task won't be easy; there are a lot of dangers in this mysterious place, and the walls are always moving to harden your way…

name: Hungry Cat Nonogram
summary: Simple rule: complete the grid accordingly with colors and discover the picture that hides beneath. Sounds easy? Not really! Each level is a real brain-teaser in which you will have to use logic and ingeniosity to complete larger paints. If you like to challenge your mind with Sudoku and Logigrams then this addictive game is definitely for you!

name: Hugo: Wild River
summary: Hugo: Wild River, also known as Hugo 6, is a video game developed and published by ITE for the PC in 1998. As with other classic Hugo games, it was based on the newest scenarios from the TV game shows.

name: Hunt of the Reptorians
summary: Build a deck to captain your starship. Carve apart enemy ships chunk by chunk. Design your ship to fit your play style and adapt to enemy strategies. Duck and hide from the reptilian beasts while you build up your fleet's strength to reclaim Earth.

name: Humans Are Useless
summary: A gang of nine aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, want to clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Help them in this arcade game!

name: Hunted: Survive the Night
summary: Hunted is a first person only asymmetrical multiplayer. 1 killer and up to 4 survivors compete. The Monster has to kill every survivor, and the survivors has to escape by playing 6 haunted music boxes scattered around the map to open the gate to freedom. Every character has their own abilities.

name: Hungaz: Epic Minigames
