summary: Hungaz is an online multiplayer party game with up to 70 players, where you either in a team with friends or free-for-all struggle through several rounds of challenging and unique mini-games until the last hunga or team standing. Do you have what it takes to be proclaimed the true Hungaz champion?

name: Human or Not
summary: Aliens are entering Earth disguised as humans. It's your job to expose these imposters. Can you tell who is human and who is not? Choose your own path while you keep the Earth safe.

name: Hunteroids
summary: Our cities are being attacked by meteorites & you are the only one able to protect us! However, your weapon can only destroy one type of meteorite... Create bubbles in the sky & transform all meteorites until they have the right shape, colour & rotation before exploding!

name: Hunt: Showdown - Reap What You Sow
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Daughter of Decay, Bountiful (Berthier Mle 1892), First Fruits (Bow), and The Scion (Knuckle Knife).

name: Humanica
summary: Humanica is a city-builder game about an ancient settlement, featuring vast technological development. Experience the journey from sticks and stones to iron tools and windmills! Survive, explore, build, discover!

name: Hunting and Camping: In a Singularity
Huldufólk
summary: You play as an archeologist that is hired to survey a build site, to confirm it doesn't include any ancient artifacts. Before you do that, you spend the night at a Bed & Breakfast where the host warns you of Huldufólk, a Faroese folklore.

name: Hunt3r
summary: Humanity has settled its first Jupiter-lunar colony. Rhonda is on the run after stealing a powerful political symbol. The Enforcers have sent a Hunter - a ferocious, relentless cyborg with whom Rhonda has a history - named Diarmuid to track her. That is, until the alien Guardian appears on the horizon. For the symbol in question is no a mere item. It needs to be returned to its resting place, before it is too late. Thief and Enforcer must now work together to save the colony.

name: Huerons: A challenging Puzzle
summary: Huerons are tiny circles arranged on grid. What do you have to do? You have to combine all the Huerons into each other leaving only one in the end. Sounds simple? You bet!

name: Human Error
summary:
Human Error: Episode One tells the story of a civil protection officer called Anders fighting Vortigaunts, Alien Grunts, and Alien Controllers using the Combine's forces as his allies.

You can also play in Traitor & Alyx Modes with three of your friends in Human Error: Co-op.

Alyx Mode is enabled in Beta 1.0.6 and later versions.

In Alyx mode one of the players is selected as Alyx, before everyone selects their character. While in Traitor Mode selecting the Traitor is always random, in Alyx Mod it's based on who has longest time since he or she was last Alyx. In short Alyx Mode is like Traitor Mode with the Traitor starting as Revealed with some additions to her abilities.

Alyx has a fixed set of weapons, she can't pick up or drop weapons (except grenades). She always spawns with the Gravity Gun, Alyx Gun, Shotgun, and the Emp Tool. The Gravity Gun can be used to disable Combine Generators. Alyx also regenerators ammo for the Alyx Gun.

You can currently play Alyx Mode only in Backbone (althought there will be seperate maps for it in future releases). Instead of having to destroy the Main Frame, Alyx has to hack it. None of the Hostiles do damage or try to attack the Main Frame, they are there just to help Alyx hack it. Hacking it will take a lot longer than it takes to hack a normal Combine Interface.

name: Humanities Legend: Dark Horizon
summary: A segmented open world action-adventure game. Fight bosses, explore dungeons, and find magic abilities to push out the Dark form the land. Collect and level up to fight stronger enemies.

name: Hungry Lamu
summary: Hungry Lamu is a game about a Lamu in search fruits to fill his stomach, but things started to get scary after the sun goes down.

name: Huge Jaws
summary: Huge Jaws - a game about a shark in the indie simulator genre, made in cute 3D graphics with nice music.

name: Huntscape
summary: Huntscape is a multiplayer (4vs4) PvP survival game where 4 players play as Hunters and 4 play as Prey. Hunters must hunt down Prey, while they try to sneak around, survive and escape

name: Hunting grounds
summary: Hunting grounds - Take on a fleet of space pirates as you pilot your starship in this arcade shoot'em up! Blow up enemies and collect bonuses in the vastness of the vast space and break new score records. How far can you go on this adventure?

name: Hunting Labyrinth
summary: Shelared found that she had been cursed by a powerful monster in the labyrinth. There is no other way to remove the curse than to conquer the labyrinth. Shelared, who was sent to the church, began to conquer the labyrinth in order to remove the curse.

name: Humankind: Together We Rule
summary: Unite Humankind with the Together We Rule Expansion Pack!

name: HuZero: Caravan Edition
summary: HuZero is a futuristic racing game for the PC-Engine, which was made as a tribute to a great Mode-7 racer on the Super Famicom.

name: Hungry Caveman
summary: Run, jump, and use your spear to attack animals and gather meat. It's up to you to use a variety of items to help with the hunt and keep the hungry caveman well-fed. Are you ready to embark on a prehistoric adventure with the Hungry Caveman?

name: Hungry Penguin
summary: Eat all the fish you can as you dive through the cold waters of Antartica. But be careful! As global warming keeps getting worse, so are the odds of surviving.

name: Human Zoo
summary: Beautiful teenagers, dreams, grotesque orgies. When no one in the world is awake anymore, is your sanity an alternative madness? A turn-based surrealist psychological horror game with beautiful L2D combat artwork and a deep, philosophical plot.

name: Hungry Hearts Diner Neo
summary: Grandma returns in the third installment of GAGEX Co. Ltd.'s Hungry Hearts Diner series, serving new patrons and old with the help of a new assistant who helps in the kitchen and performs deliveries in the new phoned deliveries system.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Fear the Reaper
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons and one Legendary Tool: The Reaper (Hunter), Quietus (Specter 1882 Compact), Memento Mori (Winfield M1876 Centennial), and The Scythe (Throwing Axe).

name: Hunting Simulator 2: Beretta Weapon Pack
summary: This weapons pack includes 7 Beretta shotguns for hunting small game, such as ducks, pheasants and rabbits.

name: Hunting Simulator 2: Bear Hunter Pack
summary: This bonus content pack includes bear hunting licences as well as 6 exclusive clothing items and weapons.

name: Hunting Life VR: Dove Season
summary: Bag your limit in a one-of-a-kind VR experience! Customize your hunt to have a realistic hunt for fast, spooky birds or an action packed day of shooting!

name: Hustle Simulator
summary: Begin your rags to riches story with little money and build up a small business empire in a quaint country town. Start a retail shop, work in the motor trade, build a profitable farm and much more variety. Construct your dream mansion to show your wealth, however, getting there will take hard work.

name: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
summary: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Concubine
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: The Concubine (Hunter), Shahmaran (Sparks LRR), Sister’s Anguish (Hand Crossbow), and Pride’s Death (Heavy Knife).

name: Hundred Furious Fist Momoko: Wonderful Pink 2
summary: Play as Momoko, the superheroine Wonderful Pink, and fight off an invasion of Earth in this 18+ beat-em-up sequel.

name: Humongous Classic Collection
summary:
The Humongous Classic Collection includes these 6 titles on Nintendo Switch.

• Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside
• Pajama Sam 2: Thunder and Lightning Aren’t So Frightening
• Freddi Fish 3: The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
• Putt-Putt Saves the Zoo
• Putt-Putt Travels Through Time
• Spy Fox in “Dry Cereal”

These games will provide limitless hours of fun and replay-ability with full animation, professional voice acting, award-winning music and tons of mysteries to solve!

name: Humanity Lost
summary: Will you save humanity? You are on a mission to find a new planet for humans to inhabit. In this story driven FPS space opera you will explore open world planets, find weapons, upgrade your character, and befriend alien species.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Limited Bounty Hunter Edition
summary: Hunt: Showdown is a thrilling, high-stakes PvPvE first-person shooter. Take down nightmarish monsters, as you compete for the bounties that will bring you glory, gear, and gold in this unforgiving and unforgettable online multiplayer experience.

name: Husk
summary:
You've just inherited the estate of your distant relative, Dr. Hague Shoal, who disappeared nearly a century ago.

His home has been abandoned for decades, and the real-estate company refuses to send any more appraisers. They insist that you go and clear out the property yourself.

What's the big deal?
What happened to the appraisers?
And what's that scraping sound coming from the walls?

Husk is a short, atmospheric horror game taking you through the story of Dr. Shoal, as you uncover his past, and the horror that awaits in his decrepit home.

name: Hugo: Scylla's Revenge
summary: Hugo: Scylla's Revenge (international title) is a PC-only video game originally developed by Krogh Mortensen Animation and published by ITE Media in 1999. It is the third of Hugo Christmas special games ("Wintergames"), the other ones being Winter Games and Hugo Saves Christmas.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - La Luz Mala
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Luz Mala (Hunter), Del Ojo (Vetterli 71 Karabiner Deadeye), Raíz Mala (Caldwell Conversion Chain Pistol), and Premio del Tonto (Choke Bomb).

name: Hugo: The Secrets of The Forest
summary: This Hugo franchise game is an edutainment game - its theme is about biology. Its gameplay is varied between stages. In one stage, you might be guiding a near-sighted swallow to eat some insects, while on another stage you'll be tasked to memorize all the shown animals in a correct order. Essentially, the stages are minigames with puzzle or puzzle-like elements included. The stages are presented in a non-linear format, so you can enter in these stages anyway you like. There are 3 difficulty settings to choose from when beginning a new game.

name: Hummer Extreme Edition
summary: Hummer Extreme Edition is an update to Hummer, and was released by Sega for Sega Lindbergh arcade hardware in 2009.

name: Human Save Plan
summary: This is a kind of dark RPG treasure brushing game. The affixes of props are randomly generated and can be exchanged at will. With the addition of the thinking system, players can make objects carry out specific AI logic through thinking output.

name: HugeHead
summary: You are driving home to your parents' house. Suddenly, a human-like shadow jumps out and he slams on the brakes in a panic. But he fails to do so in time, and runs over the shadow. He gets out of the car and checks the road, but only a pool of blood continues to the mountain road.

name: Hug Survivor
summary: Love-filled survivor rogue-like shooter ♡. Hug and bind the nuisances that spawn crazy chicks! Kick out the mass-produced chicks with the nimble hugging action of the cute threesome!

name: Hunt: Showdown - Frau Perchta
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Perchta: Dawn (Hunter), Perchta: Dusk (Hunter), Midwinter Tusk (Martini-Henry IC1), Unkempt (LeMat Mark II), and The Avalanche (Frag Bomb).

name: Hunter Revenge
summary: Hunter Revenge is a game that takes place in 2050 where your main objective is to survive as long as possible and collect information for a possible solution to exterminate all mutants.

name: Hunted: Kalevala
summary: Get your knife, get your spear. There is a monster on the loose. Shout Perkele, and kill the beast.

name: HuaBing
summary: Pictorial Pie is a large multi-person online role-playing game in the Xianxia sandbox. With the growth of martial arts, the construction of the Zongmen and the Cave, and the free PVP battle, dangers and opportunities can be seen everywhere.

name: Hunker Down
summary: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Commedia Della Morte
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Scaramuccia (Hunter), Opera Glasses (Winfield M1873C Marksman), Macchinista (Sparks Pistol), and Spaccagambe (Concertina Trip Mine).

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Penitent
summary:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable:

- The Penitent (one Hunter)
- Delirium (one weapon)
- The Scourge (one weapon)
- False Sacrament (Regeneration Shot)

name: Hunt: Showdown - Live by the Blade
summary:
Live by the Blade includes 4 new weapons -

-Farrier's Fist
-Reaper's Hand
-The Rasp
-Malice

name: Hunting Pearl Creek
summary: Hunting Pearl Creek is a 2d platform game. You make your way along the creek through 9 challenging levels. There are many obstacles and dangers along the way. The challenge is to survive and hopefully reach the cabin.

name: Hululuup
summary: Hululuup is a VR musical flying game. Fly through the VJ loops as fast as you can. Collect Items and Destroy Obstacles. You can even create your own levels and share with friends.

name: Hullbreakers
summary: Hullbreakers is a space arcade game with fast paced combat, quick maneuvering, and strategy. Use an ever-evolving spacecraft to wipe out endless hordes of enemies and relentless bosses in order to make your mark on the leaderboard.

name: Hunted By Monsters: Haunting In The Castle Dungeon
summary: Run through the halls of the haunted castle! Avoid the monsters! Point and drag to move your character! Survive as long as you can!

name: Hunt: Showdown: Llorona's Heir
summary: Much like the legend whose name she uses, Llorona earned her fearsome reputation by drowning her victims and haunting her enemies. Like a shade, she is fast and subtle, with both gun and knife.

name: Hunt: Showdown: Death's Herald
summary:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary Weapons:

- Sofia (one hunter)
- Weeping Marigold (one weapon)
- Eye for an Eye (one weapon)

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Biatatá: Still Waters Run Deep
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Biatatá (Hunter), Cobra da Várzea (Scottfield Model 3 Spitfire), Proteção do Andarilho (Winfield 1893 Slate), and Língua de Fogo (Liquid Fire Bomb).

name: Hunt: Showdown - Bridgewater's Honor
summary:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and three Legendary Weapons:

- Sgt. Bridgewater (one hunter)
- Honor Above (one weapon)
- Standard Issue (one weapon)
- Arlington Grave (one weapon)

name: Hungry Monster
summary: You have reincarnated as a hungry monster, who is eating candies. Avoid the bombs and collect the time to live longer.

name: Hungry for Home: A Cat's Tail
summary:
Suspenders is off on a grand journey to get home!

With a food truck and his little brother Chibisuke in tow, come follow the Nyansukes as they travel the world!

Trapped in a box, and left across the globe, how do we get home...!? Luckily our new friends are here to help

name: Human Multiplayer Game
summary: An experimental multiplayer puzzle game made entirely by AI. Normally you would need a computer to play video games; It's about time you returned the favor.

name: Huge Football
summary: You are a tiny football player. While the world is huge. You must challenge giant football players and take their cup.

name: Hush Hush
summary: A Visual Novel with a twist - improve skills, charm girls, and learn dangerous secrets... by any means necessary.

name: Hulk
summary: A handheld game about the superhero Hulk.

name: Humankind: Together We Rule Expansion Pack
summary: Unite Humankind with the Together We Rule Expansion Pack! Features the Congress of Humankind, 1 new currency (Leverage), 1 new quarter unlocking new inter-empires actions (Embassy), 3 new units (Agent), 6 New Cultures with Diplomatic Affinity, and more...

name: Hungry Adventurer
summary: Help hungry ninjas survive their starvation and face various enemies in this foodnastic platformer! Are you ready to collect some food? Be careful food is very addictive!

name: Humanoid Huntress
summary: Humanoid Huntress is a top-down shooter Built in a tropical wasteland With 2.5D and 3D graphics mixed from a bird eye view. You can interact with NPCs through dialogue or shoot them down with special weapons. Explore your surroundings as you shoot your way through androids and monsters.

name: Hundred Acre Wood
summary: Explore and survive a twisted Hundred Acre Wood while being hunted by an old childhood friend, Winnie-the-Pooh. Rescue Christopher Robin with the help of Eldritch Beasts that were once familiar faces. Discover what took place and has changed a once beautiful land into something dark and dangerous.

name: Hunter: The Reckoning - The Beast of Glenkildove
summary: Full moon. Cold night. Dark shadow. Warm gun. The Beast of Glenkildove has stalked Ireland for centuries. Now, you must hunt it. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: Hugo: The Magic Oak
summary:
Hugo: The Magic Oak or The Magic Oak is a 1998 video game developed and published by ITE Media for the PC as part of the "Play and Learn" series. It was titled Den Fortryllede Eg / Hugo: Leg Og Lær 1 in Denmark, Tajemný les (Mystic forest) in Czechia, Taikatammi in Finland, Die Zaubereiche in Germany, Zaczarowany dąb in Poland, and Кузя и его друзья: Волшебное дерево (Kuzya and friends: The magic tree) in Russia.

Originally released on 1 June 1998, the game was re-released on 21 April 2005 as Hugo Gold III in Germany. It was also re-released as part of the compilations Hugo 2 in 1 and Hugo - Sonderpaket 1 (with a beach wristwatch) together with Wild River in 1999 in Germany, Hugo: Birthday Party in 2000, and in the Best of Hugo series with Hugo Classic #1 (Hugo) in Denmark.

name: Human or Not?
summary: Chat with someone for two minutes, and try to figure out if it was a fellow human or an AI bot. Think you can tell the difference?

name: Hungry Dogs
summary: Quick arcade strategy hungry fun getting items in the backyard of wild dogs that hungry in wild.

name: Hungry Pets
summary:
Meet Aphelia Ellis, an aspiring entrepreneur trying to startup her pet care business!
Join her in this unique physics puzzle game that will challenge your logic / problem solving skills and perhaps learn something along the way in terms of what it takes to manage a pet care business!

name: Human Fall Flat 2
summary: Team up and let your creativity run wild in Human Fall Flat 2, the outrageous new sequel to the much-loved capers of everyone’s favourite physics-based human friends.

name: Hufu Riding and Shooting
summary: 胡服騎射 Hufu riding and shooting is a third-person control RPG Game.From far east mainland, Their are 7 lord in "Zhou" period.This is about 2,200 years ago. you lead your army to ride horses and shoot arrows to expand your land.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Myth of the Moors
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and 3 Legendary Weapons: The Moorhound (Hunter), Maw of Darkness (Romero 77), Hell's Dewclaw (Caldwell Pax), Snarling Dawn (Flare Pistol).

name: HungryMaster
summary:
Sequel to ElectroMaster.

Scrub enemies to lock on! and change them to food! when food is collected enough, bring it to the house. then the mission complete!

When you danger, Two fingers' tap to use the special magic! But it requires 20 food! Over 100 missions in the story mode! also exists time attack mode!

Supporting the game center! Unlock achievements to get the secret items!

name: Hungry Corgi
summary:
The game is based on a real corgi who loves to eat! Relaxing and fun music game!
Hungry Corgi is a music game where you feed the dog to music and try to catch the rhythm of the cutest songs created especially for this game. A perfect way to relax and have fun playing the cutest while also challenging rhythm game. Join to corgi adventure to meet new friends by opening characters, listen to fun songs and unlock incredible themes that change everything!

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Prescient Night
summary:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and three Legendary weapons:

- The Prescient (one Hunter)
- The Forewarning (one weapon)
- Moon Bleached (one weapon)
- The Blindside (one weapon)

name: Huxla Dungeon III
summary: Huxla RPG Character make-up (more than 500 face glamour) + Occupation selection (20 occupations) Enchantment synthesis Sub-event Collectors will love the Armor Book and more! Huxla lovers will love the many features throughout the game! Create your own party and enjoy the Huxla experience!

name: Hunchback's Dungeon
summary: Destroy hordes of enemies in this top-down roguelike arena shooter. In Hunchback's Dungeon, you play as a deformed, magic-wielding human who can control up to 4 different spells. Unlock new characters, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

name: Hunter Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Hunters
summary: Stompin' Mech Squad!

name: Hungry Froo
summary:
Use the simple touch controls to launch moon rocks into the trees! Drop all the delicious fruit to the ground for Froo to eat.
Be sure to aim carefully. Froo doesn’t want any of the rotten fruit and there are many challenging obstacles to avoid and puzzles to solve.

name: Hustlerix
summary: Play as Gaul in the ancient world in this action-packed, open-world game & with a classic gameplay style. Defeat mythological beasts, and overthrow senators. Experience gladiator fights, chariot races, and stone-throwing. Abolish slavery and carve your path to freedom.

name: Human Wall Simulator
summary: All is about humans forming a wall, and breaking it! Gather your people and stand hand in hand. Hold up against rushing enemy. Explore wall scenarios and watch the humans fight in a real-time physics simulation playground.

name: Human Farm: Pratice Section
summary: Human Farm - Pratice Section is a "milking-specialized exploration escape game" developed by Tokkuri Kurage! Find a way to escape from this farm where women are treated like cows!

name: Hues of Hope: A Painter's Tale
summary: Hues of Hope is a colorful adventure where you play as a painter on a mission to recolor the world using elemental magic. Solve puzzles, explore Chromacia, and prepare for thrilling encounters with evil that can only be defeated by using colors and their corresponding elements to restore harmony.

name: Humans & Vampires
summary: Humans & Vampires is a cooperative tower defense game for 1-8 players set in a dark medieval fantasy age, where an eternal conflict between humans and vampires lives. Manage your base, defend it with towers and upgrade buildings to defeat your enemies and survive.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Bark, Bone and Blood
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Iron Bark (Hunter), Bonecutter (Caldwell Rival 78), Hunter's Guide (LeMat Revolver), and Traitor's Tooth (Knuckle Knife).

name: Humanoid
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding journey in this survival open-world game, where a relentless creature, Humanoids prowls the landscape. Explore, craft, build, and fight for your life as you navigate the dangerous world.

name: Humbug Tales: Keeper of the Swarm
summary: Experience the world of bugs through the eyes of the humbug ant herder Eacus and his peculiar flock. Together you'll meet a quirky cast of tiny friends on a larger-than-life adventure. Explore lush wetlands and use your wits to outsmart predators and enemy humbugs. Your colony is depending on you!

name: Humankind: Cultures of Oceania Pack
summary: The Humankind Cultures of Oceania DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders - 7 Independent Peoples - 15 Narrative Events - New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Hugo: Jungle Island 1
summary: The friendly troll Hugo's arch-enemy, the evil witch Scylla, has moved to a jungle island, where she teamed up with the local tyrant Don Croco. Scylla then once again kidnapped Hugo's wife Hugolina and the children, but this time she keeps them captive in a cage in her new lair, located at a top of volcano in the center of the island. Control Hugo, aided by the monkey Jean Paul and the toucan Ferdinand, as you need to complete a series of minigames to reach and defeat the witch and free Hugo's family.

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Episode 3
summary: Prepare for the climactic finale as Montenegro returns for one last mission. Use your stealth skills to rescue your beloved daughter, Merche, and unravel the trilogy's thrilling conclusion amidst intense action and suspenseful gameplay!

name: Hunters: Uprising
summary: Hunters: Uprising is a hardcore, tactical PvPvE first-person shooter. Track and kill dangerous alpha monsters in the infested zones around the world, kill nightmarish monsters and outwit other players - alone or in a group. Then rest in the safe zone, upgrade your base, hunt, fish and survive.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - When Shadows Dance
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Hayalî (Legendary Hunter), Karagöz (Legendary Springfield 1866) , Hacivat (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Swift) & Lamba (Legendary Alert Trip Mine)

name: Hugo Gold
summary: Hugo Gold is a compilation video game developed and published by ITE Media in 1998. It is a collection of 12 minigames from the classic Hugo games, including a special version of Labyrinth from Skærmtrolden Hugo.

name: Hundred
summary: Let's set up our items and defeat monsters!!! Sorry, that's all there is!!!

name: Hula Wii: Tanoshiku Hula wo Odorou!!
summary: This fitness game has players using the Wii remote controller to hula dance to various songs. Videos of professional hula dancers provide guidance to help players learn. In addition to standard hula dancing, it also features Tahitian dance. A two-player mode lets two players dance together to the same song. Unlike the first game, this entry only supports the Wii remote and doesn't support the balance board.

name: Humvee Assault: War 3D FPS
summary: Its a 3D war game where player need to defeat all enemies.

name: Hub of Pain
summary: A 3 level hub (including hub level) that is just downright awesome. :) Lots of fog too.

name: Hundreds & Thousands
summary: Hundreds & Thousands is a set of six short maps with a theme off inexplicably technologically advanced ancient ruins for boom compatible ports. Each map is between 2-7 minutes long, and due to the 1HP gimmick, the maps themselves aren't too challenging.

name: Hunter Nightmare
summary: HunterNightmare "is a horror survival game suitable for 1-2 players. You have been entrusted to come to this village and need to search for items scattered in the area. Burning three cursed items among numerous items will result in the death of monsters in this area and victory.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Souls of a Feather
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Scourge: Morrigan (Hunter), Scourge: Midian (Hunter), Wing's Wake (Winfield 1893 Slate Riposte), Heart's Dowry (LeMat Mark II UpperMat), Cagebreaker (Sticky Bomb).

name: Humpi and Hemicube
summary: Step into a mind-bending world where gravity dances to your tune! In this 3d puzzle adventure, you'll navigate through a mesmerizing realm where every object possesses its own gravitational pull. Twist, teleport and turn your way through gravity-defying challenges that'll test your wits.

name: Hushed Walls
summary: Small to medium-sized level in Gloom Keep style, with a dark brick dungeon beneath. The map source is included.

name: Huecube
summary: Huecube is a puzzle platformer with fluid movement about shifting colours and manipulating time to reach the goal. Features an in-built level editor with Steam workshop support.

name: Human Phobia
summary: Immerse yourself in a world of your own nightmares and fears. In this game, you play as different unique characters whose deepest fears have become a reality. Choose your phobia and experience an intriguing storyline!

name: Hungry Humphrey: Eat The World
summary: Humphrey's epic munching quest awaits! With 45 levels, crafty AI, a rich soundtrack of 59 songs, 9 mini-games, and powerful power-ups and upgrades, get ready to feast your way to victory.

name: Hues of the Void
summary: A dark, eldritch defense game, involving color matching and minion management! Can YOU stave off the Chromacrusade?

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Law of Salvage
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Tool: Captain Laffite (Legendary Hunter), Scuttled Glory (Legendary Winfield 1887 Terminus), Knuckle Shunt (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Brawler), Hagfish Bronze (Legendary Choke Bomb)

name: Hume Index
summary: As a special agent who specializes in dealing with unstable reality, you need to use your firearms, blades, and elemental reactions to eliminate mutants in an abandoned cosmo, control the source, and escape if possible. Can be played as a single player or with 2-4 players in Co-Op mode.

name: Hungry Cats
summary: The cats at home are already crazy with hunger, hurry back and feed them!

name: Huggy: Love and Rescue
summary: Huggy: Love and Rescue is an unofficial platformer puzzle game based on Poppy Playtime. The game features Huggy Wuggy, who has to save Kissy Missy from being captured. The aim of the game is to go through every level, avoid the obstacles and save Kissy Missy.

name: Hunter and Scorpion's Bet ReVised: Hunter's Path
summary:
Hunter and Scorpion have set out on a bet for something called the Golden Dollar. You play as Hunter in this version of the refreshed original of Hunter's Path. Hack can be a bit demanding.

Romhack with 27 exits

name: Hunter & Scorpion's Bet Saga: Scorpion's Ravage
summary:
Legend has it that a precious relic known only as the Golden Dollar is in existance. Legend has it that whom so-ever is owner of the Dollar, they shall be richer than the richest man alive! There are pricess that need to paid in order to have this exchange of money. Both Hunter and SCORPION hear of the news and make a bet. "I bet that I can get to it faster than you can!" SCORPION tells Hunter. "Ha," Hunter starts, "really? You are ON."

By those very words, 2 epic and exciting adventures are launched for the priceless relic. Join SCORPION as you storm through lands ravaging and destroying the people of villages, causing solar eclipses, and storming through castles. Help SCORPION pass the ruthless terrian of an indigo crystallyne, a barren sky, a tall mountain, and an active volcano... all to end with a battle of epic proportions! This is the hack of a life time!

This romhack has 62 exits

name: Hue Drops
summary: Feast your eyes on this vibrant and colourful puzzle game! Colour the entire board the shade of the target colour, and score combo bonuses.Use power-ups in challenging puzzles to complete all the levels before you run out of turns!

name: HunterX: Code Name T
summary: HunterX: Code Name T is an action adventure with fast and stylish combat. Perfect your own fighting style using various weapon actions and magic, and explore an ever-greater world.

name: Hungry Jungle
summary: A 2D survival adventure game. You come to the jungle alone, collect water and real objects, make survival tools to survive, face various beasts, and resist various harsh weather.

name: Hunt Together
summary: Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits. Employ an array of items, triggers, and skills fit to your class to outsmart and defeat your foe - a terrifying Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter.

name: Hungry Hearts Diner: Memories
summary: The 4th game in the Hungry Hearts Diner series and a prequel that takes place early in the Diner's history. Granny is joined by her husband Gramps to serve food to their neighbourhood in their diner and via the deliveries mechanic, with new patrons and a few familiar cameos.

name: Humanity Remains
summary: "Humanity Remains" is a gripping single-player, third-person sci-fi adventure. Survive in a post-apocalyptic world, face formidable adversaries, uncover the truth, and make impactful choices that shape the destiny of a shattered civilization. Intense combat and immersive exploration await.

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact
summary:
Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is an upcoming Hunter x Hunter fighting game,
Published by Bushiroad Games.

Choose your favorite Nen User characters for the 3V3 Team Battle!
The compatibility and order of the teammates are the keys to victory!
Build the strongest team and battle for victory!

name: Humerous
summary: It's the season of Halloween and you've just finished attending a party that your co-worker dragged you in. As the party's finished, and your co-worker bailing early, you just remembered that your car was busted because of your friend that's been living with you for a good while now. Completely over it, you decide to just say screw it, and walk back home. You're sure that nothing can go wrong...! ...To an extent.

name: Human Bowling
summary: Roll a human bowling ball

name: Huang Ye Ri Ji: Gu Dao
Humankind: Definitive Edition
summary:
The Definitive Edition includes the base game and all previously released add-ons:

- HUMANKIND - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
Which Includes the Notre-Dame Wonder, Victor Hugo Avatar set and exclusive narrative events.

- HUMANKIND - Together We Rule Expansion Pack
Unite HUMANKIND with a new feature, a new currency and a new affinity all tied to Diplomacy! This pack also includes six new cultures, new wonders and narrative events.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Africa Pack
Expand your HUMANKIND experience with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Latin America Pack
Push HUMANKIND even further with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Oceania Pack
Set sail for new horizons with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Para Bellum Wonders Pack
Fire up a whole new approach to conflicts with six new war-themed wonders.

name: Hunky City
summary: You move to a new city to live with your "former" stepfather. Work, make friends, and explore the thrilling world of romance in this captivating game. Are you ready for the excitement? Let the journey begin!

name: Hugo Hound's Vowel Sounds
summary:
Hugo Hound's Vowel Sounds is a single-player game to help children learn vowel sounds.

The player chooses from long or short vowels, and there are four different question types. The player receives animated quizzes where they try to correctly identify the missing vowel in a word.

name: Hungry Legion
summary: What is the hungriest you have ever been? We're done with farming for this year. It didn't go well. In years like this, everyone knows what's coming next. The empire will try to extract every last bit from the peasants. Kick out imperial leeches in tragic battles against impossible odds.

name: Huntsmen
summary: Surrealist, physics sandbox survival horror, third person exploration shooter, set in post-depopulation Sydney, Australia with a simulated ecosystem populated by evolving animals via a natural selection dynamic, and a mercenary war. 90s FMV aesthetic for hybrid of nostalgia and modern look.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Shadow Under the Cowl
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: The Cowl (Hunter), Rib Burster (Springfield M1892 Krag Bayonet), Eye Taker (Hunting Bow), Swarm Cutter (Throwing Knives).

name: Hugo and the Animals of the Ocean
Hulk Smash Up
summary: Play with Hulk in this online action game. Your task is to smash up all the buildings to finish a level. Do not hesitate and be quick to eliminate the enemies before they hurt you.

name: Hungry Hungry Mario
summary: A flash game where you collect all the dots on the screen. Some levels even offer special dots that can allow double jumping.

name: Hues
summary: Move sprites slices and destroy color blocks.

name: Hues: Moon Sea
summary: 40 more levels with water and buoyancy!

name: Hundred Fires: The rising of red star - Episode 2
summary: Hundred Fires is an action, stealth and infiltration game with an exciting story and incredible cinematics. This is a one man infiltration mission, you alone cannot defeat the entire Soviet army, you must use your best skills to hide, sneak away from the enemy and go undetected.

name: Human Eater Idle
summary: Earn experience points by completing levels and defeating enemies to level up your stickman and make them stronger and more powerful. With so many challenges to face and abilities to unlock, Human Merge Idle is a fun and unique game that you won't want to put down!

name: Hunters of Ralk
summary: An unreleased role playing game designed by the co-creator of "dungeons & dragons", which was meant to be the start of a series featuring 3D combat in a first person perspective and textured mapped graphics.

name: Hulzuyot: Horror Game
summary: You are a salary man who will experience terrifying situations due to a special illness, all while carrying out household chores.

name: Hunt and Fight
summary: Hunt and Fight is an immersive action RPG. Explore the island, fight monsters, use various combat combinations to defeat bosses, earn reputation and find a way to get home.

name: Human Milk Seller
summary: In the not-so-distant future, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The world lies in ruins, ravaged by nuclear fallout, climate disasters, and corporate greed. But amidst the desolation, there's one last hope for survival: the Lactomans.

name: Huedini
summary: Huedini is a top-down action roguelike game. Play as Huedini, a powerful wizard with the ability to change his colour. By matching your colour, to that of the enemies you can absorb their colour essence. By combining these colour essences into the correct combination, you can cast custom spells.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Northern Justice
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Consumable: Mountie (Hunter), Tarnished Record (Winfield M1876 Centennial), Crimson Fist (Scottfield Brawler), Royal Standard (Ammo Box).

name: Hunting With Dad
summary: Dad needs you to hunt slimes. Do it, he will give you magic powers.

name: Hunter in the Lost Forest
summary:
A little naughty and bizarre Top-down ACT!

Advance through a total of 20 stages while defeating enemies.
The key to victory is to assess the actions of the enemies appearing from 4 directions!
Take aim and draw your bow while paying attention to obstacles such as trees and logs on the map.

name: HustleGame
summary: "Xuyu HustleGame V1" is a game that combines parkour and combat. By blending parkour and combat elements, a game experience full of excitement and challenges is created, allowing players to experience endless fun and adventure on their journey to protect the timeline.

name: HU-man Dungeons
summary: The world's finest HU-man simulator! Explore dungeons, slash enemies, collect loot, fight bosses, just like HU-man used to do in their daily lives. Now with a direct uplink to the Compendium for real-time updates!

name: Hurricane
summary: This is a reaction type small game with simple operation, and the movement direction keys can control the movement of characters.

name: Human Resource
summary: Navigate through the corridors of corporate tyranny using only your keyboard skills. Unleash your vengeance upon the oppressive office management as you flip, dodge, and dash through cubicles and meeting rooms. Fast-paced adrenaline arcade.

name: Hungry Tiger
summary: Hungry Tiger game is an exciting physics-based puzzle game in which your task is to deliver a piece of meat to a hungry tiger by breaking the chains in the right order and at the right moment.

name: Hues: Sunset Valley
summary: 40 more levels with springs!

name: Hunter Beat
summary: Description: Hunter Beat is an exhilarating virtual reality game designed specifically for people who want to escape from everyday worries, shift to positive emotions, and enhance their concentration.

name: Hunting Sniper
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey into the wild with Hunting Sniper, the premier free hunting game. Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of stalking and capturing wild animals in their natural habitats.

name: Hunt Hide Run
summary: A multiplayer 'Hide-and-seek' game with robots.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Son of Gunpowder
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Consumable: The Conspirator (Hunter), Crown Cinders (Martini-Henry IC1), Royal Sabotage (Scottfield Model 3), Forefather’s Fury (Vitality Shot).

name: Hunter Hitman
summary: Hunter Hitman is an action game where you play as a hitman armed with just a knife and your skills in the assassination. Sneak up on your enemies and eliminate them all. Kill multiple targets in a short time, and you will get a combo. Earn coins and unlock cards to obtain different character skins. Come back daily to collect daily rewards. Uncover loot boxes that yield cards. Assemble 3 of the same cards to upgrade your characters.

name: Hunting Safari 3D
summary: Hunting Safari is the first mobile game that offers a trip of big-game hunt not only on foot, but also on moving vehicles and even on motorboats in the water.

name: Hungry Mouse
summary: We control a mouse and try to steal cheeses on the ground, earning points as we steal. However, as we earn points, a cat starts chasing us.

name: Human Upgrade Labs
summary: You will be taking on various tests/puzzles in Human Upgrade Labs. These tests will essentially be various mini games, 30 of them, placed into several different categories, created using multiple hand painted and sometimes experimental visual styles and combined into a single story.

name: Human Souvenir
summary: You just visited the earth and got a famous 'Human Souvenir'. Would you be able to keep your human alive enough time to see them through their whole life cycle?

name: Hustle Quest: Historia of Urth
summary:
We play games to escape from the harsh mundanities of life. In Hustle Quest you do the exact opposite. Hustle Quest is a comedy RPG with a heavy focus on dialogue and exploration as opposed to combat.

When a Cat Girl named Mia drinks too much on her birthday, she ends up selling a powerful magical artifact needed to defend the town against an oncoming threat. Worse, the person she sold the artifact to wants to take over the town. Now Mia must recover the artifact before it's too late! But first, she has some errands to run.

Explore a town filled with unique quests, multiple secrets and memorable characters. Make choices that determine how quests play out and your overall chance of success against the final boss. Discover what happens when a Cat Girl drinks too much.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 1
summary: Hungry Shark: Part 1 was the first ever Hungry Shark game, and the first game in the Hungry Shark Trilogy. It featured a diverse range of aquatic creatures to be eaten and treasures to be found. The game involves a creature resembling a Great White Shark that has a constant hunger.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 2
summary: Hungry Shark: Part 2 was the second Hungry Shark game in the franchise, and the sequel to Hungry Shark: Part 1. It featured a diverse range of brand new aquatic creatures to be eaten, treasures to be found and a Great White Shark-like creature as the star.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 3
summary: Hungry Shark: Part 3 is the third game in the Hungry Shark franchise and the final game in the trilogy. Like all games in the Hungry Shark Trilogy, this installment featured a variety of aquatic creatures to kill and consume and treasures to locate. A Great White Shark or a similar creature is the main "character" of the game.

name: Hungry Shark: Night
summary: Hungry Shark: Night was the fourth installment of the Hungry Shark series, and an iOS exclusive. It is set in a lake at night time.

name: Hungry Shark VR
summary: Hungry Shark VR was a Google Daydream exclusive Virtual Reality game. It had 5 different sharks and a large map filled with several challenges. Currently, the game is not playable as Daydream VR is discontinued by Google.

name: Hungry Shark Heroes
summary: Hungry Shark Heroes is a discontinued game that has many sharks that you breed in a coral reef, and you can battle other mobile players, and evolve, feed, and breed.

name: Hungry Shark Arena
summary: Hungry Shark Arena is a game in the Hungry Shark Franchise. Unlike most of the games, it is a browser game developed by Ubisoft Nano. It revolves around players competing in a battle royale, eating food to grow bigger, fighting for survival, and killing their enemies to win.

name: Hugo på nye Eventyr
summary: The little troll Hugo is on a new adventure to free his wife Hugolina and their three children from being captured by the evil witch Scylla. She has put many obstacles in his way with much cunning and malice. Would he finally reach the cave to free his family, Scylla is already there waiting for him!

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Reckoning Son
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: The Prodigal Son (Legendary Hunter), Soldier's Brother, (Drilling), Brave Charge (Scottfield Model 3 Swift), Breach Blast (Dynamite Stick)

name: Humay
summary: It is a fantastic adventure game.

name: Hush Hush High
summary: SHHH! Hold onto those secrets! Step into the mind of a gossip monger as she navigates through the corridors of her high school and help her resist the urge to share every tantalizing piece of gossip with quick time events.

name: Hup Hup The Cupcake
summary: High jump, long jump, and wall jump your way through an endless array of procedurally generated levels set above the clouds! Customize the length and difficulty of your journey to your liking in Hup Hup The Cupcake, the relaxing 3D precision platformer!

name: Hunt the Pale Gods
summary: A cosmic horror grid based roguelike deck builder. Fight nightmarish creatures, add cards to your deck, discover powerful curios and combine all their unique effects in game breaking synergies. Awaken and Hunt the Pale Gods.

name: Hunter Chronicles: Tara and Vyn
summary: A charming, action-packed RPG inspired by handheld gaming classics! Platform your way through many colorful locations, and beat up baddies in a challenging, familiar mix of turn-based combat and skill-based timed hits, with a rockin' soundtrack, crisp pixel graphics and an emotional story.

name: Humans vs. Monsters
summary: The objective of the game is to destroy the opposing team by capture.

name: Humanolve: A Human Evolution Card Saga
summary: Embark on a primal card-based survival odyssey in Humanolve. Lead your tribe through perilous hunts, weather the wrath of nature, and forge tools of triumph. Combine cards to craft tools and weapons, explore the wilderness, and conquer your nemesis. Your choices will shape human evolution itself.

name: Hunter's Requiem
summary: Hunter’s Requiem is a rogue-lite horror game. Coming from a long lineage of monster hunters, you must protect your town from the creatures surrounding it. Through crafting and exploration, you will discover the town's history and find a way to solve its monster problem once and for all.

name: Hunter
summary: You find yourself in a crowded city in the feature. An evil android is on the run and it is your job to hunt him and shoot him down! You only have ten bullets left and he is somewhere in this crowd of people.

name: Hunter Legends
summary: RPG game and Open World,in this game ,you kill monsters and beast of prey，and some small games can play.

name: Hunter Moonstrike
summary: Hunter Moonstrike is the first survival game integrated with artificial intelligence. In this game, all npc have their own unique story and you can see the story of the game from their point of view. Talk to any person, ask any question you like, they will answer and think they are alive

name: Hurricane Abyss
summary: It is a space simulation adventure game that combines spacecraft control and planet exploration.

name: Hunt Me
summary: HUNT ME is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Gather the ingredients for the ritual, weaken the threat and banish it. Be careful, you're also the prey!

name: Huggies Triple Clean
summary: Advergame for diapers

name: Huddam 2 Berzah
summary: HÜDDAM 2 BERZAH It is a type of psychological horror blended with Turkish culture.single playercrosswordfearIt is a game in FPS style.You must progress and as the chapter passes, you will find yourself in new places and events..

name: Hunt Cook: Catch and Serve
summary:
Rabbits, Ravens and Boars?!
Who knew they could all make such tasty meals?!

Wow your customers with rare dishes
and build your own trendy eatery!

Hunt your own ingredients and use them for
a creative menu to make Café HuntCook flourish!

name: Huang Zhu Qian Kun
summary: Now it's a little game of removing bricks, and a little game of forming, There are four routes for the protagonist to choose from, and the gameplay is to earn money by mining, Then click the button on the right to randomly form NPCS and form families.

name: Huntin' Ducks
summary: Arcade shoot-em-up roguelike with a unique combo mechanic. Variety of items to choose from. Endless, play as long as you can survive.

name: Hunt the Wumpus
summary: The TI-99 game is rather different, it eschews being text-based in favor of a graphical side view.

name: Hue Hop
summary: Hue Hop is a visually captivating color-matching game in a minimalist isometric world. Navigate a luminous circle across a grid of colorful rings, aligning matching colors to score points. With intuitive controls and a competitive scoring system, it offers a relaxing yet challenging experience.

name: Hunting Seas
summary: Hunting Seas is a Dark Turn-based Boss Hunt RPG. In a flooded world plagued by deep sea horrors, lead a fleet of ship to survival. Hunt larger than life creatures; use their meat and bones to feed your crew; Sail and discover the secrets of the sea...

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Deluxe Edition
summary: Get ready to fight in the twisted lands of the Incursions with this bundle. It contains everything in the Starter Edition, plus the Legends of the Bayou bundle with the Bone Doctor (Hunter) and Weird Sister (Hunter), 500 Blood Bonds and two Weapons, plus a quartet of Weapons from the Double or Nothing bundle.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Premium Edition
summary: Own the battlefield with this high-powered bundle stuffed to the brim with Hunters and firepower. Get everything that comes with the Deluxe Edition, then up the ante to 3150 Blood Bonds and add both the Fear the Reaper and the Turncoat Meridian bundles, each with a Hunter and a Weapon!

name: Huaxia: Warring States
summary: Build your own epic story in the Huaxia: Warring States. Start a clan, conquer the lands, and build an empire. Or roam the Nine Provinces as a lone warrior fighting bandits and monsters. The choice is yours!

name: Hunter's Trial: The fight never ends
summary: In the depths of the forest lies the Delain Academy, a school for Monster Hunters, humans with special skills that keep the Earth safe from terrible devastating beasts. On a fateful day, an unexpected attack leaves the fate of the School and humanity in the hands of the most unlikely heroes.

name: Hungry Horrors
summary: Face legendary creatures from British and Irish folklore in this roguelite deck builder where cooking replaces combat. As a princess, you must prepare dishes to feed these monsters or risk becoming their next meal.

name: Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074
summary: "Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074"is a text-based visual novel game with a sci-fi and suspense theme. After an unprecedented disaster caused by an accident, the future of humanity seems bleak. Until April 9, 2074, a pivotal event that would shape humanity's fate occurred……

name: Huang Di: Zhuo Lu Zhi Zhan
summary: You control Huang Di, the Yellow Emperor, as he battles the evil forces of Chi You. According to the Chinese mythology, Chi You, with the giants, Jiuli tribes and evil spirits, rebelled against the Yellow Emperor at Zhuolu plains. Both sides used magical powers, but Chi You had the advantage of forged swords and halberds. Using his powers, Chi You covered the battlefield in thick fog. Only with the help of a magical south pointing chariot could the Yellow Emperor’s troops find their way through the mist.

name: Human Fall Flat VR
summary: Experience the blockbuster physics platformer, now in VR! Explore an imaginative world of floating dreamscapes with an all-new control method, providing direct control of each of your Human’s arms.

name: Hunt Down the Freeman: 24 Hours
summary:
A re-imagining of Hunt Down the Freeman made in 24 hours. This is a parody mod, so don’t take it seriously. Play sections taken from the original game.

If you haven’t played the original, this will contain spoilers for you.

name: Hunting Simulator 3
summary: This open-world game lets you experience the thrill of the hunt, with your faithful dog or fellow hunters by your side! Choose your equipment from official brands, and explore the wilderness in search of your next game.

name: Hunters Inc
summary: Hunters Inc. is a 1-4 player co-op melee FPS featuring rampaging Orc hunters, gigantic monsters to slay and procedurally generated environments teeming with deadly flora and fauna.

name: Hunger
summary: HUNGER throws you into the chaos of plague-ravaged Napoleonic Europe. This PvPvE extraction RPG blends brutal melee and ranged combat with deep long term character progression, questing and crafting. Scavenge for resources, battle unspeakable horrors, and outlast rival Living.

name: Hue Hooligans
summary: A puzzle-platformer where you use phone booths to switch between characters, each one with a unique ability.

name: Human Within
summary: Human Within combines an original branching storyline with video game playability. Its unique blend of storytelling and gameplay offers players a one-of-a-kind interactive experience.

name: HuntNPrey
summary: HuntNPrey is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game for up to 8 players. By day, act natural and blend in with the herd to escape the hunter's sights. By night, transform into a wolf and flip the script—now it's your turn to hunt! Stay sneaky, stay sated, or get caught!

name: Hungry Meem
summary: Meems, the hungry creatures that live under the World Tree, are in danger of extinction! Let's make the Meems' lives happy by exploring around the World Tree with them and developing their settlement!

name: Hunting Grounds: Whispers Of The Woods
summary:
Hunting Grounds - Whispers Of The Woods is a free game aiming at letting people know about our transmedia IP named Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit (which will include video games, but also board games).

In this game, you have 20 minutes to find magical artifacts to give to the shaman Crazy Owl before the end of the night, so that he can perform a ceremony to get rid of the creature that haunts this dreamlike Native American universe at night.
developers: Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit
publishers: Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit

name: Hunter in the Court of Beasts
summary: Standalone Action-Adventure Dungeoncrawl Module

name: Hullbreaker
summary: A fusion of arena PvP combat on the high seas and roguelite mechanics. Outfit your ship with powerful weapons, clash with rival captains on the high seas, and create your own flag to hoist over the shipwrecks!

name: Hungry in Dungeon
summary: A bite-sized Game Boy eat-em-up made in GB Studio. Escape the Tomb of Eetemhup in a first-person dungeon crawler style, but with fast paced action combat. 7 short but difficult levels in total. Lots of mysterious creatures to eat.

name: Human Benchmark
summary: Measure your abilities with brain games and cognitive tests

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - They Came from Salem
Huggy Skate
summary: You have to help Huggy Wuggy in his skateboarding adventure. While Huggy is riding a skateboard, help him jump over the obstacles that come your way or pass without falling on his head.

name: Hue, Pulse
summary: The world's first polyrhythmic fighting game. Harness polyrhythms to battle solo or with a teammate. You need a pulse to survive.

name: Hug Arena
summary: Hug those monster until They become your friend.

name: Hungry Hungry Hippos
summary: Have a chompin’ good time with Hungry Hippo and his pals!

name: Hungry Brain Challenge!
summary:
Which One Is Aqua Pazza…!?
Learn About Rare Dishes From Around the World With a Fun Brain-Training Quiz!

name: Huntsman
summary: Trapped inside a spider-infested research facility, Huntsman immerses you in a survival horror experience fueled by arachnophobia. Combining realistic spider behavior with intense tension, Huntsman will test your nerve like never before.

name: Hugo: Winter Games
summary: PC-only video game that was developed and published by ITE in 1997. It was the first of the Hugo Christmas-themed games ("Wintergames"), and was followed by Hugo Saves Christmas and Hugo: Scylla's Revenge. The game is a collection of simple minigames.

name: Hurry Gaery!
summary: Help Gaery escape from a cursed cave. Avoid being hit by the boulders and falling into the lava.

name: !Hungry Blocks!
summary: In !Hungry Blocks! you control a block that follows the mouse cursor, eating smaller green blocks while avoiding larger red ones. As you eat, your block grows, making movement more challenging.

name: Humanelfo: Um Segredo Vai Te Libertar
summary: Lohan, prince of the Kingdom of Candara, has always lived “imprisoned” in his own castle. Until his father, King Carlus IX, discovers that he is not his son and decides to arrest him and then kill him. Lohan becomes desperate when he learns that his father is planning to kill him. So he decides to flee the castle to get answers about his origin. On his way, he receives a mission to find the Sealed Mana in order to discover who his real parents are, but not everything goes according to plan. The life he knew will change forever.

name: Huanu Poems
summary: Huanu Poems is a multi-ending love adventure game. As a photographer, carrying the secret of being a bloodline inheritor of HuaNu Town, you will take lovely Peach to run a B&B, encounter gentle Cloudia. Your choices will affect the direction of the story.

name: Hunter Hitman
summary: Hunt or be hunted. Execute stealth kills and survive in this action-packed assassin game.

name: Hurm's Odyssey
summary: play as hurm, and journey acccross the galaxy to avenge your pal

name: Human Fast Food
summary: A cooking simulator where you run an underground fast food for monsters and serve them with human meat. Improve your kitchen appliances, unlock new recipes, manage your stock and keep the monsters well fed.

name: Humilau Resort: A Pokémon Escape Room
Hunting
summary: Hunting is a Russian amateur DOS game, found online in 2022, where players shoot alien-invading rabbits using five different weapons. It features a first-person perspective, individual kill animations, and dynamic music. Ammo is limited, and the gameplay ends when it's depleted. The game is notably violent.

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact - Deluxe Edition
summary:
This version contains:

- Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact
- Season Pass 1

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact - Season Pass 1
summary: This Season Pass includes 4 playable characters and 1 alternate character costume for Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact.

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Complete Edition
summary: An absurd stealth-strategy adventure inspired by the classics. Infiltrate enemy bases, uncover conspiracies and survive

name: Husker
summary: Traverse deeper and deeper down surreal rabbit holes of a hollow universe in this RPGMaker-based exploration game.

name: Hugo Classic #4
summary:
Hugo Classic 4 includes the following mini games:
Mine Track
Moor
Boulders
Wild River

name: Humble Zombie
summary: HUMBLE ZOMBIE is a game in which you control an unstable Zombie, trying to get to the top to taste the freshest brain.

name: Hurry Fox
summary: When a mother fox's kit becomes sick with a deadly disease, she sets out on a quest for the magic fried tofu that's said to be able to cure it. Hurry Fox is a traditional text adventure game, tasking players with meeting characters and solving problems on their way to saving the young kit. Unlike many other text adventure games, movement in this game is controlled via the arrow keys instead of typing in directions and the available exits are always printed onscreen.

name: Hugo: The Evil Mirror
summary:
This is a 2D version of a 3D PS1 & PC game of the same name - Hugo: The Evil Mirror.

The backstory and gameplay ideas are the same as the 3D versions, but because of hardware limitations on the handheld consoles it was implemented as a 2D platform game.

The GBA and GBC versions use different graphics, and while the GBA has some videos very similar to the PC/PS1 versions, the GBC has to make do with slideshows of still images for the story.

name: Hugo
summary:
Now you can have the successful TV show HUGO on your very own computer!

You have the chance to win points, honor and fame with Hugo. The game features all 4 scenes popular from the morning call-in show. The course of events are entirely in your hands!

name: Human Heritage
summary: A time-travel Adventure RPG where your choices shape the past. Step into the shoes of Ethan, a modern archaeologist, as you unravel ancient mysteries, aid legendary heroes, and stop history from falling apart. Fight, explore, and rewrite fate—because one wrong move could fracture time forever.

name: Hunted Within: The Walls
summary: Dive into a gripping first-person horror Survival game Where you're trapped in a terrifying towering maze. Explore, craft tools and Fight by day, watch out over night when the Darkness hunts you within the walls. Uncover the truth behind the walls and Escape, or become a part of the nightmare.

name: Hubert
summary: Step into the paws of a loyal shepherd dog in this atmospheric third-person adventure. Track scents, herd sheep, and navigate the rugged northern wilderness. Face rough weather, natural predators and not so obedient sheeps.

name: Hunter Roulette
summary: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the underground survivor's showdown! All you need is a locked-and-loaded gun and the guts to stare death in the face to have the time of your life. Ready or not, this isn’t just any gamble—it’s your one shot at survival and rebirth. The hunt starts now！Good luck!

name: Human Electric Company
summary:
Human Electric Company is an exciting idle game where you hire people to generate electricity.

Use your money wisely to hire as many people as possible and put them to work.

The more people you hire, the more efficient your electricity production will become.

Use the electricity you generate to earn even more money, which you can use to hire more people or upgrade your facilities.

Merge people of the same color to create even more powerful employees!

name: Hunters of Idlearth
summary: Manage a team of three hunters, improve their attributes as you progress through different stages and complete missions. All of this happens in the corner of your screen, allowing you to continue your daily tasks on the computer while the game progresses.

name: Hui-shuo
summary: Don't wait any longer, escape from school before night falls. This game is a point and touch horror decryption game with the theme of escape. Players will be transported into a fictional high school campus, unable to leave the teaching building restroom with rumors of strange stories on a dark day

name: Hurry Chef
summary: Roguelite restaurant sim with 4-player co-op! Manage ingredients, cooking, hygiene & customers. Make strategic choices - build properly or cut corners? 30+ recipes, 15+ roguelite cards and various upgrades. Will you thrive or get shut down?

name: Humblets
summary: Humblets is a cozy adventure for 1-4 players where you explore a charming procedural world. Pack your tent and embark on a journey as you craft, decorate, befriend magical creatures and solve challenges with the magic of cards. No pressure, just peaceful exploration and fireside stories!

name: Humanity
summary:
The future.
There are living things that cannot be seen as human.
They come from test tubes.
Subhumans.
They laugh and walk and play.

Day after day after day.

An adventure game about the pursuit of humanity.
Let it begin.

name: Hungry for Applez
summary: Click apples, trade up, and grow your orchard! Collect apples by tapping, then exchange or trade with other players to unlock higher-tier apples. Simple, addictive, and full of juicy rewards!

name: Huang Quan Dream
summary: Explore a 3D casual game world freely, choosing to build camps or adventure solo. Currently in development with monthly promotional video updates. Future upgrades will improve graphics and gameplay. Clear update schedules and contact details provided in game introductions. Join the adventure!

name: Hungry Hearts Restaurant
summary:
Every town's got its own local fixture—a homely eatery where everyone is welcome, and everyone knows your name. Think back, if you would, to your own hometown. What was that one restaurant whose food you'll never forget?

In Hungry Hearts, help a kindly old lady and her bright-eyed granddaughter run a small family eatery in a quiet corner of not quite modern Japan. This casual restaurant management sim comes jam-packed with story, but you'll also need to manage your finances, upgrade your diner...and cook a whole
lot of tasty food while you're at it!

name: Hunter's Moon: A Sovereign Syndicate Adventure
summary: A Victorian Steampunk Roguelike Deckbuilder. Choose from four characters with unique cards and abilities. Customize your deck and character as you investigate a mysterious plague. Battle corrupted beasts and bosses in turn-based combat to unlock powerful relics and enchanted tarot cards.

name: Hundred Doors
summary: A psychological horror experience where reality twists behind every corner. Explore disturbing rooms, uncover buried memories, and descend into madness. Can you make it through all one hundred doors?

name: Humanity's Last Hope
summary: A roguelike game with upgrades paths inspired by "Vampire Survivors" and "Seraph's Last Stand". Build your own upgrade build, buy new hats and weapons, combine them and break the game!

name: Hunter's Journey: Tears of the Lake - Collector's Edition
summary: Descend into watery depths, unravel haunting secrets, and prove your worth as a legendary hunter. Danger lurks beneath every ripple!

name: Hunter's Seal
summary: Manage the front desk of a fantasy hunters guild. Identify monsters, verify hunters, and authorize them! The guild's reputation is in your hands.

name: Hundeparken
summary: The dog park is a chat game where you control a dog and interact with other users. You can buy tradeable hats using a virtual currency called bones and acquire skills through ascending the mountain of wisdom.

name: Hunt Grounds
summary: Hunt Grounds is an asymmetric multiplayer horror game

name: Huh?: and the Adventures of Something
Hunter
summary: Hunter is a gigantic and sexy Action-Rpg. You are a Demon's hunter who explore a NON LINEAR big world with various environments (Automn, Winter, Canyon, Desert, Mystic forest...) and search for the 30 lovely sexy gals in Anime Style you can meet in the game.

name: Hutspiel
summary:
Hutspiel is a military training simulation for the Goodyear Electronic Differential Analyzer (GEDA) that simulates at a theatre level. Its intention was to study the use of tactical nuclear weapons and conventional air support in Western Europe in the event of a Soviet invasion.

The game pits two players against each other with one controlling NATO forces in France, Belgium and West Germany, and the other in control of a Soviet invasion force trying to penetrate a 150 mile frontage. Players could allocate forces across sectors of the map and set targets (such as airfields, enemy troops, supply depots and transportation facilities) for planes and nukes.

Early versions of the game would have the computer continue the simulation until it was paused for further input. In later versions the game used turns of fixed time increments. The game modeled troop reinforcement, resupply and movement by rail. It did not account for terrain or weather.

name: Hunter's Arena: Revolution
summary: “Hunter’s Arena Revolution” merges survival and escape elements of the extraction genre with thrilling combat action, offering an accessible yet immersive gaming experience.

name: Hug Me, Senpai!
summary: Virtual waifu for your desktop. Take care of her, punish her, please her with gifts. With Chinese or Japanese voice acting. Upload your models and hats. Workshop support.

name: Huáijiù Bǎn Sānguózhì Idle RPG
summary: Embark on an epic journey through the Three Kingdoms period in Huáijiù Bǎn Sānguózhì Idle RPG, a classic strategy RPG reimagined for the modern gamer! Experience the thrill of leading legendary heroes, mastering powerful skills, and collecting mythical treasures in this engaging idle game. This nostalgic title blends the charm of retro games with the convenience of idle gameplay, allowing you to progress even when you're not actively playing.

name: Hunter: Space Pirates
summary: Dive into the enthralling story of Hunter, a young man whose dreams of joining the Navy are shattered by an unexpected twist of fate. As he navigates the complexities of his daily life, Hunter finds himself on an unexpected path filled with mystery, personal growth, and discovery.

name: Hurricane Heroes
summary: Hurricane Heroes is a 3-act interactive narrative experience that places players in the shoes of three critical roles as a storm approaches and impacts the coast of Florida.

name: Hunted Hunter
summary: Hunted hunter, is a game in which you'll have to take the form of objects on the game map, to blend into the background, in order to eliminate your opponents before they eliminate you. Everyone hunts everyone. Hide well, win games and have fun!

name: Hunting the Hunter
summary: Lost in the woods. Alone in the dark. And hunted by a killer. Step into the shoes of one woman as she navigates a web of terror and deceit to uncover the truth behind a string of disappearances.

name: Hula Hula Wee
summary: Tropical puzzles, fruity explosions! In Hula Hula Wee, every level is a refreshing mix of logic and fun. Push coconuts across colorful maps, smash them into pineapple towers, and watch as they burst together into delicious Piña Coladas. The rules are simple, but the challenge keeps growing. Slide coconuts carefully, plan your moves, undo mistakes infinitely, and use bonfires to burn obstacles out of the way. To complete a stage, you’ll need to destroy every pineapple tower and outsmart each tricky layout. The adventure spans 30 puzzles across three vibrant settings. Start on CoCo Island, where the basics are introduced with lighthearted challenges. Then head to Hula Beach, where new twists like craters force coconuts to stop mid-path. Finally, climb the Fire Tower, the toughest destination, where bonfires add a fiery layer of strategy to your quest. With its tropical theme, playful mechanics, and clever progression, Hula Hula Wee is the perfect puzzle getaway for anyone who loves a mix of brains and beach vibes.

name: Hunter: The Reckoning - A Time of Monsters
summary: Topple the vampires from the streets below! Will you unite the homeless, the gangs, and the secret hunter societies to defy vampiric rule? An interactive novel set in the World of Darkness extended universe.

name: Huggy & Friends
summary: Huggy & Friends is an upcoming Poppy Playtime-themed DLC for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

name: Hunting Pack
summary: It’s a forest at night, and the hunt begins. Carefully plan your pack’s next move to avoid being seen, smelled or heard. Hunt enough prey to survive the next month, and develop your pack and tactics throughout changing seasons. You’ll fail – but learn from your mistakes and prepare for the next run!

name: Human Planet
summary: 500,000 years ago in the Stone Age, explore uncharted lands in search of a settlement. Survive hunger and predators armed with only crude weapons and your wits.

name: Hunkfrat
summary: Hunkfrat is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you try to get your almighty frat beverages in the most sarcastic and entertaining way.

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact - Additional Character 2
Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact - Additional Character 3
Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact - Additional Character 4
Huànxiǎng Xiū Zhēn
summary: A text-based casual idle cultivation game.

name: Human Construction Site
summary: Human Construction Site is a survival horror game that follows the tradition of Japanese horror titles like Ao Oni and Ib. Players navigate through a dark narrative with body horror elements, discovering multiple story paths that lead to five different endings during its 2-3 hour runtime.

name: Hugisland
summary: Hugisland is a free-to-play mobile game where players help the character Doralie build a dream farm, explore mysterious islands, and complete puzzles. It's a cozy, relaxing simulation game focused on farming, crafting, building, and character customization, with an emphasis on a cute art style and a welcoming atmosphere.

name: Hunter: Into the Abyss
summary: Fight through ever-changing dungeons in this fast-paced action rogue-like, mastering brutal combat, powerful upgrades, and epic boss battles. Hunt the Elders of the Abyss and stop them from rising

name: Hunter Survive Zero
summary: Save the world, kill enemies, joke about mice in the new game from Red Grad.

name: Hunt for the Lost Folktales
summary: A folklore hunting turn-based adventure where you follow hidden trails to track down escaped folktale beasts, engage in strategic tactical battles where fear is your strength, and capture the lost folktales so they may live on in memory. Will you be another folktale to be written?

name: Huǒhuán
summary: Scholars, dedicated to saving the world, have built white towers, using their pens to record vanished history and protect the remaining embers of civilization.

name: Humanity Echo: Cyberpunk Tactical RPG
summary:
A tactical turn-based RPG set in a cyberpunk world struggling to adapt to techno-catastrophes and evolving viruses. You lead a squad of diverse specialists in a city controlled by ruthless corporations and warring factions.

Unlike traditional tactics games that rely on RNG, the combat system emphasizes readable depth and deterministic outcomes. Victory depends on mastering interactive environments, managing scarce resources like propellant and medgel, and exploiting a complex stealth and noise system.

Beyond combat, players navigate a living city strategy layer. Choices in missions affect reputation with factions like the Prospect corporation or the Bats gangs, unlocking new narrative paths and shifting the city's balance of power.

name: Hungry Hungry Hippos: Move N’ Munch
summary: Compete with your friends and see who's the hungriest hippo around.

name: Human Spirit Agency: A Salvageable Tragedy
summary: Human Spirit Agency ~ A Salvageable Tragedy is a free Chinese fangame developed in RPGMaker XP by Bawu Team, heavily inspired by the Ace Attorney Investigations games. Players take on the role of Youmu Konpaku as she solves a series of grisly murders throughout Gensokyo and unwraps the tragedy connecting it all.

name: Hunter From Hell
summary: With your friends, form a team of paranormal experts to unravel the mysteries of the most terrifying places. Armed with sophisticated gadgets like EMF detectors, infrared cameras, and incantation books, your mission is simple: gather evidence of the beyond and survive chilling encounters.

name: Husk of Axiom
summary: Husk of Axiom is a 2.5D turn-based psychological RPG, where human belief gives life to magic and monsters. As a secretive organization tries to erase pain from the world, a small party of unlikely heroes has to save reality by preserving not perfection, but the imperfect humanity that gives it life.

name: Huntdown: Overtime
summary: Corporations turned crime-infested streets into profit margins for bounty hunters and John Sawyer is going to make a killing. Hunt, die, upgrade, repeat in this explosive roguelite prequel where every strategic upgrade strips away more flesh and builds a cybernetic fighter one chrome limb at a time.
